choices: Chad doesn't grow. Somebody else grows!
Chad doesn't grow, but his neighbors, friends and classmates grow!
1.content:
Chad was feeling great! He was still wearing his high tops, his long, white socks, his white shorts and his red basketball jersey from the game, showing off his biceps. He looked tall and athletic, and he knew that the girls on the parking lot were giving him plenty of looks.
As he walked through the glass sliding doors, a short, fat man with a beard and a huge belly walked out of the grocery store carrying one bag of groceries in his arms. Just as the man approached Chad, the bag slipped out of his hands and fell to the ground, spilling all the groceries to the tiled floor.

The man grunted and groaned as he bent down and started to pick up the bag, but Chad beat him to it, while he tried his best to show off his good looks and the fact that he was in such good shape.

“My goodness, old man! Look at you!” Chad laughed as he quickly squatted down and picked up the paper bag. “I can gather the groceries and the bag in no time at all! You’re still huffing and puffing!”

Chad hopped around the small lounge area before the entrance to the store, quickly collecting all the items that had fallen out of the bag. He had gathered everything in less than a minute!

“Look, young man! I appreciate your help! But you don’t have to insult me just because you’re younger and stronger than me!” the man said.

“Look at you! You’re a real fatty!” Chad said, as he handed the bag to the old man by shoving it in his hands. “You would move around a lot quicker if you were to go to the gym instead of watching TV and eating cookies all day!”

This had clearly angered the short, bearded man!

“Listen here! Don’t you anger me anymore! You don’t know who you’re dealing with! I am a wizard! Just because you’re bigger and stronger that doesn't give you the right to make fun of others! How arrogant!” the man said in an angry tone of voice.

Chad just took it in stride and laughed.

“Yeah, well, you have a good day, fatty! If your belly keeps on getting bigger, you won’t be able to move at this rate!” Chad giggled, not realizing that he had just insulted the man again!

“Well, that was the last straw! You have just insulted Wesley the Wizard!” the man said out loud, as he set the bag on the floor. “You think you’re big and strong? Oh, really? You think you’re bigger and better than others? How arrogant! I will teach you a lesson! You are now cursed, my boy!”

Then, the bearded man started saying some magical verses in a weird language, which sounded like Latin. In the meantime, Chad thought that the man had just gone crazy, and tried to turn around and walk away, but he couldn't move! His feet were glued to the floor!

After about a minute or so, the man was done chanting his weird verses, when he concluded with one word.

“Bigger!”

Then the bearded man picked up his bag and walked away, towards the parking lot.

“What a total weirdo! A complete nutcase!” Chad just laughed. “Is THIS what I get for helping somebody?”

Then Chad walked into the store and bought his bag of cat food, not realizing what had just happened…

So... What kind of growth does Chad experience after this?

'Maybe it was just a street performer.' Chad thought. 'Or a clown. Maybe his 'curse' was only a little joke. I know that there are no such things as curses.'

Later, after breakfast, Chad noticed a bottle of cola on the table.

"what is this?" Chad asked his mom Julie, out of curiosity.

"It's a new cola, called ColaGro." Julie said. "It came from somewhere in North America, delivered by someone called Mr. William Lesley."

"That sounds familiar." Chad said.

"Apparently, it was tested by someone called Lord Howie." Chad's dad Bradley said.

Ken, from Bee Movie?

For those who don't know what 'Bee Movie' is:

A honey bee named Barry B. Benson (Jerry Seinfeld) has recently graduated from college and is about to enter the hive's Honex Industries honey-making workforce alongside his best friend Adam Flayman (Matthew Broderick). Barry is initially excited to join the workforce, but his courageous, non-conformist attitude emerges upon discovering that his choice of job will never change once picked. Later, the two bees run into a group of Pollen Jocks, bees who collect pollen from flowers outside the hive. The Jocks offer to take Barry outside the hive to a flower patch, and he accepts. While on his first pollen-gathering expedition in New York City, Barry gets lost in the rain, and ends up on the balcony of a human florist named Vanessa (Renée Zellweger). Upon noticing Barry, Vanessa's boyfriend Ken (Patrick Warburton) attempts to squash him, but Vanessa gently catches and releases Barry outside the window, saving his life.

Barry later returns to express his gratitude to Vanessa, breaking the sacred rule that bees are not supposed to communicate with humans. Barry and Vanessa develop a close bond, bordering on attraction, and spend time together frequently. Later, while Barry and Vanessa are walking through a grocery store, Barry is terrified to discover that the humans have been stealing and eating the bees' honey for centuries. He decides to journey to Honey Farms, which supplies the grocery store with its honey. Furious at the poor treatment of the bees in the hive, including the use of bee smokers to subdue the colony, Barry decides to sue the human race to put an end to the exploitation of bees.

Barry's mission attracts wide attention from bees and humans alike, and hundreds of people show up to watch the trial. Although Barry is up against tough defense attorney Layton T. Montgomery (John Goodman) the trial's first day goes well. That evening, Barry is having dinner with Vanessa when Ken shows up. Vanessa leaves the room, and Ken expresses to Barry that he hates the pair spending time together. When Barry leaves to use the restroom, Ken ambushes Barry and attempts to kill him, only for Vanessa to intervene and break up with Ken. The next day at the trial, Montgomery taunts the bees, which causes Adam to sting him. Adam's actions jeopardize the bees' credibility and put his life in danger, though he manages to survive. While visiting Adam in the hospital, Barry notices two people smoking outside, and is struck by inspiration. The next day, Barry wins the trial by exposing the jury to the cruel treatment bees are subjected to, particularly the smoker, and humans are banned from stealing honey from bees ever again.

Having lost the trial, Montgomery cryptically warns Barry that a negative shift in the balance of nature is imminent. As it turns out, the sudden, massive stockpile of honey has put every bee out of a job, including the vitally important Pollen Jocks. As a result, without anything to pollinate them, the world's flowers slowly begin to die out. Before long, the only flowers left with healthy pollen are those in a flower parade called "The Tournament of Roses" in Pasadena, California. Barry and Vanessa travel to the parade and steal a parade float, which they load onto a plane to be delivered to the bees so they can re-pollinate the world's flowers. When the plane's pilot and copilot are knocked unconscious, Vanessa is forced to land the plane, with help from Barry and the bees from Barry's hive.

Armed with the pollen of the last flowers, Barry and the Pollen Jocks manage to reverse the damage and save the world's flowers, restarting the bees' honey production. Humans and bees are seen working together, and certain brands of honey are now "bee-approved". Barry becomes a member of the Pollen Jocks, helping to pollinate the world's plants. Barry is also seen running a law firm inside Vanessa's flower shop, titled "Insects at Law", handling disputes between animals and humans. The film ends with Barry flying off to a flower patch with the Pollen Jocks.

Tom Thomas gulped. "I'm definitely not in Pontypandy anymore." he said. He stared down at the humongous stairs. Going down the stairs was easy when he was normal sized, but now that he had been shrunk to the size of a doll, he felt like he was right on the top of a huge office building.

It was much much much much much much MUCH MUCH MUCH higher than when he flew in his helicopter. Tom could feel his heart skip a beat or two.

Looking down from the huge stairs, he paled and he began to feel dizzy. His stomach churned loudly. he looked concerned as he looked at the huge stairs. Going down them at his tiny size looked dangerous, and suicidal.

He gulped again. He shut his eyes. "OK, Tom, don't panic. Be cool. Use your helicopter pilot training. Think." he said to himself. "How will I get down these giant stairs?"

Tom Thomas thought of climbing the banister and sliding down, and he also thought he could be brave enough to climb down the giant stairs one step at a time.

1141222222222112121122222212111.content:
OK!

For those of you who don't know what 'Inside Out' is: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inside_Out...(2015_film)

Here's it's plot, if ya wanna know:

Riley Andersen is born in Minnesota and within her mind, five personifications of her basic emotions—Joy, Sadness, Fear, Disgust, and Anger—gradually come to life and influence her actions via a console in her mind's Headquarters. As she grows up, her experiences become memories, stored in colored orbs, which are sent into long-term memory each night. Her five most important "core memories" (all of which are happy ones) are housed in a hub that each power an aspect of her personality which take the form of floating islands. In Headquarters, Joy acts as a de facto leader to maintain Riley's cheerful childhood, but since she and the other emotions do not understand Sadness' purpose, she frequently tries to keep Sadness away from the console.

At the age of eleven, Riley and her parents move to San Francisco for her father's new business. Riley has poor first experiences: the new house is cramped and old, the moving van with all their belongings was misdirected, her father is under stress from his business, and a poor encounter at a pizza restaurant leaves her disheartened. When Sadness begins touching Riley's happy memories, turning them sad, Joy tries to guard them by isolating her. On Riley's first day at her new school, Sadness accidentally causes Riley to cry in front of her class, creating a sad core memory. Joy, panicking, tries to dispose of it, but accidentally knocks the other core memories loose during a struggle with Sadness, deactivating the personality islands. Joy, Sadness, and the core memories are sucked out of Headquarters, and taken to the maze-like storage area of long-term memory.

The other emotions try to maintain Riley's happiness in Joy's absence with disastrous results, distancing her from her parents, friends and hobbies. As a result, her personality islands gradually begin to crumble and fall, one by one, into the "Memory Dump", an abyss where memories are forgotten. In desperation, Anger inserts an idea into the console prompting Riley to run away, believing that her return to Minnesota will enable her to make new happy core memories.

Joy and Sadness encounter Bing Bong, Riley's childhood imaginary friend, who suggests riding the train of thought back to Headquarters. The three eventually catch the train, but it is halted when Riley falls asleep. They succeed in manipulating Riley's dreams to wake her and restart the train, but it is derailed when the "Honesty Island" collapses (when Riley steals her mother's credit card and begins to run away). In desperation, Joy tries to ride a "recall tube" back to Headquarters, but abandons Sadness since close proximity to Sadness will cause the core memories to turn sad, which Joy believes will hurt Riley. But as she takes off, the last personality island collapses, breaking the tube, plunging Joy and Bing Bong into the Memory Dump. At the bottom, Joy then begins to lose hope, but discovers a sad memory of a hockey game that became happy when Riley's parents and friends comforted her. Joy realizes that Sadness serves an important purpose: to create empathy in others when Riley is emotionally overwhelmed and needs help.

Joy and Bing Bong try to use Bing Bong's old wagon rocket to escape the Memory Dump, but after several tries, Bing Bong realizes their combined weight is too much and jumps out, sacrificing himself to allow Joy to escape. Joy reunites with a despondent Sadness and manages to get them to Headquarters, only to discover that Anger's idea has disabled the console, rendering Riley apathetic. To the surprise of the others, Joy hands control of the console to Sadness, who is able to successfully extract the idea, reactivating the console and prompting Riley to return home.

As Sadness reinstalls the core memories, turning them sad, Riley arrives home to her parents and breaks down in tears, confessing that she misses Minnesota. As her parents comfort her, they tell her that they also miss Minnesota and Joy and Sadness work the console together, creating a new core memory that combines their emotions; a new island forms representing Riley's acceptance of her new life in San Francisco. A year later, Riley has adapted to her new home, made new friends, returned to her old hobbies, and adopted a few new ones (fueled by new, more nuanced core memories from combinations of her emotions). Inside Headquarters, her emotions all work together on a new expanded console with room for them all, enabling Riley to lead a more emotionally complex life.

11421.content:
Chad got up today, feeling glad.

His mom was away, visiting her mother, so her dad was looking after the boys for the day.

All the same, he was thinking about the wizard that cursed him only yesterday.

'Maybe it was just a street performer.' Chad thought. 'Or a clown. Maybe his 'curse' was only a little joke. I know that there are no such things as curses.'

he went into his room, and he saw Daniel.
His mouth hung agape. He saw Daniel, whose head usually once reached his waistline, was now almost half Chad's height.

"Wow!" Chad said. "Hi, big bro!" Daniel said. "I don't know how, but I suddenly grew overnight! Isn't it amazing!"
"Yeah..." Chad said uneasily. His heart began to pound.

"Are you Ok?" Daniel asked. "Yes." Chad said suddenly. "Good." Daniel said. "Thanks for telling me." he headed downstairs.

Chad thought hard. Surely Daniel couldn't have grown that big overnight. He thought back to when the wizard cursed him. 'Bigger!' he heard the wizard say in his mind.

"No." Chad said to himself. "It must be a figment of my imagination. That wizard just cursed me, and only me."

11532211121221112222221.title: furry

115322111212211122222211.content:
It was a bright, sunny day, Yet for a spring day it wasn't too warm and there was very little humidity.
So Tim couldn't understand why he started feeling hot.
Hot, and itchy.

What gives? he wondered, scratching the back of his neck and discovering that he was in need of a haircut.
Tim saw that his fingernails were now much longer, and all ended in sharp points.
That ain't right. Maybe I'm hallucinating, he erroneously surmised, but as he went to absentmindedly bite a nail, he discovered that it wasn't just his fingernails that were growing. Some of his teeth were now much longer and sharper too.
I don't understand. What—
But he never got to finish that statement as he felt his feet hurting.
He looked down to see his toes popping out of the front of his shoes, for his toenails had gotten longer and sharper too, as his feet began to swell to much larger than their original size.
Tim started to feel faint, and instinctively reached out to grab a nearby rake in hopes of preventing himself from falling to the ground.

Yet it wasn't his regular hands that grabbed the rake, but something larger, with gnarled fingers that had hair growing on them.
he was beside himself.
He felt like if he let go, he would fall to the ground in a dead faint.
Despite the fact that there was no one in the immediate area, Tim tried to call out for help, but whatever came out of his aching mouth wasn't words.
It sounded more like an animal.
Tim doubled over in pain as every muscle and bone in his body ached.
He didn't know that he was gaining height and muscle mass; along with a tail and fur as his ears shifted higher up on his head. His mouth and nose extended into a muzzle shape as his hands and feet finished becoming paws.

When it was all over, he breathed a sigh of relief, thankful that the pain was rapidly subsiding.
Even the throbbing in his head was disappearing.
When he tried to stand upright again, Tim was shocked to discover that he was now much taller than he was a few minutes ago.
Then he felt the breeze caress what was now his bare body.
Tim was about to attempt covering his private area when he noticed that the tattered remains of what was his clothes were now puddled around his fur covered feet.
He felt more than saw his new tail twitch anxiously behind him.
He started noticing all the other changes to his body.
Both scared and curious at the same time, Tim turned to look at his reflection in the glass of a window and discovered that he was now...

Then stop making me grow and let me grow you instead... Let's see... grow, grow, grow, grow, grow, grow... Shit, I lost my count... How many grow should I say now? It will be enough with two more grow? Grow, grow!"

"Chad..." Ron said with fear, because his body was vibrating furiously.

"Don't discount me! I already lost count of how many grow should I say..."

Chad didn't realize how many times he said grow inside the sentence, so now there were more than 3 feet of growing to do for his friend...

And thus, Ron began to grow on his clothes, but as soon as his arms and legs were on the fabric around them, he felt that the growing feeling was not subsiding. It was accelerating! And then Ron began to panic, but Chad was oblivious of that, as he was trying to make numbers on his head...

"Hmm... Let's see... By now I should have said like 10 grow, but you used to be 5' 10'', so assuming that with my lots of shrink I made you like 3' I need you to gain less than 3 feet... That's 12 grow, so two more to go: grow, grow!" Chad was so proud of his calculations that he didn't realize they were wrong. And as soon as he has ended enjoying his own success, he saw his friend on the groaning couch, already eye level with him.

The door to the classroom was just opened a tad bit so Hector could hear the commotion out in the hallway. He recognized the voices of Mr. Wilson, the school Principal, and Miss Jenny, the secretary.

“Those kids have spilled that disgusting soda pop all over the boy’s bathroom and someone spilled ketchup all over one of the tables in the cafeteria!” Mr. Wilson complained out loud. “Good Lord! What am I running here? A high school? Or a zoo?”

Then, I need to get a plumber and an electrician to take of the lights and the clogged toilet… Ugh! Where is HECTOR?” Mr. Wilson shouted as he shoved the door to the classroom open and marched in.

In the meantime, Mr. Wilson sat down on the big, metal desk while he placed the cell phone to his ear.

“Hello? Can I speak to the Superintendent of Hillsborough County School District? This is Principal Joseph Wilson of Kennedy High School in Tampa, Florida. Yes! We need to review the budget numbers for the new school year! Yes! I got some maintenance issues at our old building. We got old light fixtures and old toilets in the restrooms… We have over 700 students… Yes, all are full time! I want a ten percent budget increase for operational costs! When can we meet? Tuesday? Good! Thank you!”

Mr. Wilson finally hung up the phone while he grumbled something…

Chad walked into the kitchen and placed the bag of cat food into the closet, just as Simon, the black cat came up and rubbed up against his basketball shoes.

“Hey there buddy!” Chad grinned, as he reached down and scratched Simon’s head. “Such a good boy! I bought you dinner!”

Chad was hungry from walking to the grocery store, so he opened the fridge and looked to see if there was anything for him to snack on while he waited for his mother and Daniel to come home from soccer practice. He didn't want to eat too much, knowing that his mom would prepare something for dinner soon.

“Hmm… Let’s see… Pudding? Soup? Crackers?” he mumbled to himself as he surveyed the contents of the refrigerator. “Nothing light for me to munch on? Aha!”

Chad showed a big grin on his face when he discovered a plastic bag in the side door containing some small cut-up baby carrot sticks.

“Good ol’ mom! She buys these especially for me!” the young basketball player chuckled as he pulled the bag out of the fridge and closed the door behind him. He then opened the bag and reached down with his big hand, pulling out about five small carrot sticks. They felt cold in his hand, but that was okay.

He walked up to the sink where he turned on the water and put it to the cold water setting. He then held the carrots under the water for a few moments until they were thoroughly rinsed.

“These carrots are so nice and clean… So Chad and become big and mean!” Chad mused as he then wandered over to the couch in the living room, while still holding the carrots in his hand as he grabbed hold of the TV remote. He pushed each carrot in his mouth as he crunched down on it with his teeth.

Three minutes later, Chad had finished eating his carrots and he had washed them away with a glass of water. He was watching the news on TV while playing with Simon, his black cat, when he was suddenly overcome by an odd tingling sensation in his arms and chest, specifically in his muscles!

His biceps began to feel a bit stiff and hard, like he had just come from the gym after a grueling workout! Then, without any other warning, both biceps hardened and began to swell up, together and at the same time, growing about half an inch thicker than they were before!

“Hey! Holy smoke! What the heck is the stiffness in my arms?” Chad said as he rubbed his arms. They were aching all over.

Next, that aching feeling traveled down to his chest!

His pectorals began to ache tremendously! They grew stiff and hard, like he had just completed several sets on the bench press! Then, he felt his pectorals push out a bit!

“Whaa!” Chad gasped as he stood up and almost tripped over Simon as he ran to the bathroom. There, he gawked at his reflection in the mirror, which confirmed what he had just felt. He had gained some muscle while watching TV! How did that happen? Would that happen again? What caused it?

124121211.content:
Darren's stomach made a strange gurgle.

He started breathing more rapidly, both from excitement as well as from the increased tingling in his stomach. The feel spread to his chest; a nasty sting in his heart area caused him to collapse to the ground. He landed on all fours, screaming from pain.

He started hyperventilating as the feeling in his chest increased. He started having trouble breathing as the collar of his polo was getting tighter around his neck. It wasn’t his polo which shrank; however, it was his neck which expanded. Still on all fours he took one hand and yanked the collar open. He let out a loud sigh of relief. a group of employees ran over, hearing the yells of pain.

he felt his back expand, it grew. The fabric of his polo was getting tighter and tighter, just until it couldn’t hold the pressure anymore. Then it ripped.

A clear rip down the entire length of his polo opened up his back for the employees to see. one employee now touched Darren’s naked skin; it felt rock-hard. All the muscles underneath his skin were pulsating and expanding. He tried to calm him down, who was still in a lot of pain.

Darren’s head hang downwards, facing the ground. He grunted and screamed; the transformation wasn’t painless. His expanding upper torso was supported by his arms, which he held in a 90 degree angle on the ground. In a clear moment he opened his eyes and saw his own biceps blow up to unfamiliar size, his forearms reaching Popeye-esque proportions and veins crawling all over his skin.

Not only his upper body was growing, also his legs were expanding in size. The jeans he was wearing were soon too tight and starting ripping at the seams much like his polo. Tree trunks of thighs and blown-up calves could now fully support the grown upper body.

After a minute or two, the tingling sensation went away and the growing stopped. The grunts and screams also stopped. an employee once again padded Darren’s now enormous back and asked if he was feeling alright.

Still no answer.

there was now the biggest man he had ever seen; completely ripped out of his clothes. All he was wearing was a pair of torn down jeans and pieces of fabric that used to be his polo. His head was still facing down. Darren's back rose and lowered as he slowly got back his breathing rhythm.

what next?!
124121211.title: Darren outgrows his clothes

1241212111.content:
“How are you feeling, Darren?” one employee asked as he helped Darren up. He hooked his arms under Darren’s armpit and pulled him up. He couldn’t believe how large his upper arms and shoulders were now.

“I’m…I don’t know…I’m feeling alright, I think…” Darren said as he stretched his arms out and pushed his upper body backwards. He was now sitting on his rear. His torso was still covered in rags of his polo, but with one simple tear he ripped them off completely exposing his chest and eight-pack for everyone to see.

Oohs and aahs of awe and admiration filled the empty car lot.

“Oh my god; you’re as ripped as Superman!” one employee yelled, excited.

“Wow, you're the strongest man in the world!” another added.

“Dang Darren Cole, looking good!” Jerome, his work buddy, commented.

All these comments made Darren cheer up. He was still sitting on the ground as he wasn’t completely used to his new physique. It felt heavy, yet light at the same time. He felt so strong that his body must be able to support his new size easily, but he had difficulties adjusting to his new strength. He managed to shed the remains of his shoes and socks off of his now huge bare feet.

Jerome felt Darren's toes. His smallest one was about the size of a tennis ball, and the middle toes were as long as sausages.

Jerome then decided to approach his now muscular work buddy. He had ripped off every piece of fabric and was now sitting shirtless on his rear. His chest was filled with a lightly grey patch of chest hair. Jerome decided to take the gamble and reached out his hand to touch Darren’s pectoral. He pushed down on the soft, fleshy muscle. Darren looked down and grinned. He moved his arm, unknowingly flexing his chest as a result, causing his pec to turn rock hard. Jerome’s impressed finger bounced back. He could not dent it anymore. His mouth fell open as he touched the now flexed chest muscle.

“Holy shit!” Jerome exclaimed.

Darren laughed. “That’s nothing, here, look at this!” He lifted both his arms in the air, parallel to the ground, with his lower arms at a 90 degree angle. They looked impressive, even not flexed. He asked two other employees to put their hands on his biceps. They were both impressed with the size of his arms, until he decided to flex them. His biceps suddenly jumped up, higher than before, making them peak at an impressive size. The split heads of the biceps were clearly visible through the low percentage body fat skin he was now sporting.

Everybody in the empty car lot, including Darren, was impressed. They all let out a cheer. Darren grew a smile on his face from ear to ear. He was now feeling strong enough, and confident enough of his new size, to stand up completely. He put down his hands as supports and pushed his entire body up. He shifted his legs and placed his feet flat on the ground, followed by stretching them completely. Slowly, but steadily, he rose higher and higher, until he towered over the employees by almost a foot. They looked up in awe.

Darren was always a pretty tall man, yet very skinny for his length. The man that stood before them right now was nothing short of amazing. He had the body of a giant Greek god and looked like he possessed Herculean strength. Yet it was the same old dad Chad grew up with.

Darren grinned, and wriggled his huge toes.

It was time for Chad to give Danny a ride to soccer practice again. Chad walked over to his little brother's room and opened the door without knocking.

"Hurry up, little twerp! You're gonna be late!" he sneered.

"Oh quit calling me that!" Danny shouted back, feeling annoyed at being called Chad's 'little twerp'.

"Listen here! You'll always be a little twerp compared to me! Look at this!" Chad said, as he walked up to his little brother, who was sitting at the edge of his bed while he was putting on his shin guards, his socks and cleats.

Chad intentionally walked up to Daniel, made a fist raised up his arm and held his big, bulging bicep muscle right in front of Danny's face. It was a big, hard, round ball of muscle mass which clearly showed his younger brother that he was the biggest and strongest guy in the house.

"Feel it, little bro!" Chad grinned. "Feel how hard it is! You can't do that with your puny muscles!"

Daniel reached out with his right hand and rubbed Chad's monster bicep muscle. It felt like a melon that was implanted on top of his brother's arm.

Strangely enough, when Danny touched Chad's arm, he felt a strange tingle travel through his finger down his own arm. The tingling sensation spread to every muscle in his body! What was going on here?

"Whoa! Static charge!" Danny yelped, as he withdrew his hand quickly.

"Whatever! Hurry up!" Chad said, as he got up and walked over to the kitchen.

Danny quickly tied the laces on his cleats and put on his team jersey. When he walked into the bathroom, he couldn't help but notice that his own arms seemed... a little more muscular?

Then he overheard his mom telling Chad that she had to work late in the clothing store, and that Chad had to take Danny to the mall to get some launch afterwards.

Danny just sighed. He had to hang out with Chad all afternoon. Oh well...

"Did I grow you? When did I.." it dawned on Claire "In the kitchen. I said whenever you face a problem you just get, you know, thingy and badder. I'm sorry mom I didn't mean to."
"I know baby. Its not your fault, you couldn't have known." Cassandra knelt down in front of Claire and took her hands "I need you to keep this to yourself for now okay. Your dad will panic and Daniel..."
"There's no telling how big he'd make mom if he knew, uh, in spite of the talk I had with him." Chad agreed.

"But I don't understand. How did I not notice anything?" Claire looked more confused than ever.
"I didn't notice till Chad pointed it out to me. It was as if him telling me lifted some sort of veil from my eyes, like some sort of magic spell." Cassandra felt silly for calling it magic but at this point she really didn't know what it was.
"So if someone called me bigger I'd notice?" Claire didn't look entirely convinced.
"You want proof? Okay stand in front of that mirror" Chad pointed to the mirror that covered the door of a walk in wardrobe. Claire nodded and stood in front of it "Okay, have at it. Make me bigger." Cassandra inhaled deeply "Alright, bigger." Claire went wide eyed as she saw and felt herself grow a few more inches "Holy fucking shit. I'm actually bigger."

"Believe us now?" Chad crossed his arms and had a smug smile on his face. "Okay okay, you were right. So now what? Were just stuck like this and can't go anywhere in case someone grows us. Fucking great." Claire looked frustrated, like she wanted to punch something.
"I know this is hard baby but we'll figure it somehow." Cassandra tried reassuring her daughter. "How can we solve anything being stuck in here? Sitting and waiting won't change anything, what kind of could we possibly have if we're confined to this fucking house!" Claire was getting increasingly upset "Should we just wait till we bust through the ceiling? I just.. I can't deal with all this."
Claire ran out of the room and went upstairs to her own bedroom.

"She took it better than expected." Cassandra said with a weary look on her face. Chad could tell this was getting to his mom just as much as anyone else. He knew she felt she had to be strong for everyone else, like she had to carry their hardships on her back.
"I'll go calm her down. She'll come around eventually" Chad went to his mom and cuddled her.
He received a bear hug in return from her "Thanks sweetie. She's right in a way though, we can't just wait until we grow out our own home. I don't want to destroy everything we have here, our whole life. I just don't know what we should do."

"I'll try and help in anyway I can. I promise you mom I'll find a way to fix all this." Chad looked at his mom confidently "I'll see you later after I help Claire."
Cassandra looked into her sons eyes, almost but not quite the same as hers, and saw a fire burning within them "He really believes what he's saying. He wants to fix this. I have to support him in anyway I can." she said to herself.
As Chad opened the door she called to him "Chad wait. Maybe its time I tried to teach you about my work."
That got his attention "Your work? You want to tutor me?"
"Yes. It will give me something to do and maybe it will help you in someway. Do I sound ridiculous?" Cassandra waited for a response and got one in the form of an excited smile.
"Sure mom, I'd love for you to teach me. I'll come by later after I'm done with Claire" he said enthusiastically.

Cassandra was happy Chad wanted this "It'll stop me going crazy I hope. At least I know he'll listen to what I'm saying."

Chad sprinted up the stairs to his and Claire's room. He was surprised the door was unlocked and walked in, he saw Claire sitting on their bed with her head in hands.
"Hey babe." Chad cautiously approached her "I know you're pissed off about being stuck in here but I promised I'd fix things for us didn't I? Claire look at me."
She turned her head towards him and nodded. "I'll help you no matter what, I love you so much and I will never ever leave you." Chad kissed her and she pulled him against her body.
"So that was the reason for all the magic stuff. You hope it'll fix things. Why didn't you tell me sooner though? You knew and didn't tell me" Claire had annoyed look on her face.

Chad realized he'd have to tread carefully "I wasn't sure at first" he lied, he hated lying to her, "I approached mom first in order to test it out. It obviously worked but we weren't sure if telling everyone would make things worse. I'm sorry we didn't tell you sooner."
"You were really worried about Daniel growing mom more?" Claire asked, keeping her face neutral now.
"Yeah. Don't say I told you anything but we had a talk in the car. He hates the idea of growing himself but wanted mom to be huge because of the bullying he's received." Chad explained everything to her about their brothers problems.

"Why didn't he say anything? Mom and dad would have taken him out of that place straight away." Claire was looking angry now at the thought of her little brother being hurt.
"I think he was embarrassed about the whole thing." Chad rested his head on Claire's shoulder "Seriously though, he might still think mom being giant would make things better. We can't tell him."

"Okay but what about me? Were you worried I'd want to keep getting bigger?" Claire was hurt inside but didn't show it.
"No of course not. Mom was just worried about dropping that on you, things are stressful enough already without you having to worry about being called bigger... ah, constantly." Chad felt Claire's shoulder pushing against him as she grew again.
"Well done dumb ass." Claire laughed and kissed his forehead. "I guess I should be grateful you and mom trusted me enough to finally share it."
"Mom really does trust you. I know you feel like you can't live up to her expectations but she doesn't think anything bad of you. She loves you and wants you to see what she see's. You can be as successful if you want it." Chad wanted to encourage her as much as he could, he needed her strength for what lay ahead.

Chad thought about his alternate self who instead of running towards this problem had retreated out of fear. He'd distanced himself from his family as they grew bigger and bigger instead of making sure they were okay and helping them as much as he could. "I won't abandon them like you did. I'll make sure they know I love them and will support them no matter what happens."
Chad needed to make sure he stayed emotionally involved throughout the process so they wouldn't all drift apart. He'd be the glue that kept them all together. Learning from his mom would be a great way to spend time with her and not leave her feeling isolated "I'll need your knowledge mom. I'll need everything you have if I'm to succeed and maybe I can get Claire in on it, having those two spend time together will help them a lot."

Chad had so many plans and having both Claire and his moms intelligence behind him would make it much easier for him to succeed. He knew as they grew larger they'd get even smarter, all that extra brain mass would be useful if her could get them to take advantage of it. "The things we're gonna do" Chad was giddy at the thought.

Chad and Claire climbed into bed together and cuddled with each other, they discussed Chad's plans regarding magic.
"If this is magic do you think you'd learn to control it or even allow us to control our size?" Claire snuggled her face against his.
"It would certainly help if I could. You could actually live in our home without any risks of growing out of it. That's assuming I'd be powerful enough to counter who did this. Whoever they are. There's no telling what we're up against here or how strong our opponent is." Chad honestly had no idea how powerful his enemy was or what other magic he commanded.
"You think someone did this to us then?" Claire asked "why would anyone do this?"
"I don't know but if it is magic it would make sense. Maybe one of us has an enemy we aren't aware of and they cursed you." Chad was sprinkling some truth into what he was saying.

"Why would they leave you out? Unless it was you they're targeting. Having to watch your family grow more and more in front of you and being unable to stop it would be an interesting revenge. Forcing us to leave you behind as we grew would hurt everyone like hell, especially you obviously. We'd be gods while you remained a mortal at our feet." Claire had no idea she'd more or less hit the nail on the head.
"Yeah..." Chad laughed nervously.
"I won't leave you though." his sister declared "I don't give a fuck if some dickhead thinks he can drive us apart. I will never abandon you, never stop loving you, we'll be together forever." She rolled over him and straddled his cock "you're my brother and my lover. That will never change even if I become a goddess."

"You're already my goddess Claire" Chad said as they began to make love.
12533111111111111111111111111.title: The talk

125331111111111111111111111111.content:
It was eleven pm when Chad got out of bed, showered and went to see his mom. He'd said he'd be by later so that's what he'd do.
Chad knocked on her office door and entered. He found his mom on the floor again, frustrated and trying to use her laptop "Fucking hell" she swore before she looked up at Chad and smiled. "I was worried you'd forgotten about me. Hows Claire?"
"She's fine now mom. She's sleeping so I thought I'd come see you." Chad plopped down next to her and leaned on her arm "What ya doing? It looks like you could use my help."

"Thank you sweetie. Using this keyboard is almost impossible now so maybe you can be my hands. Please?" Cassandra pouted at her son.
"Of course mom. I said I'd help you however I can so." Chad looked over at the laptop to see what she was working on "Whats that?"
"That is a new kind of reactor I was working on. I'd left it for a while before all this, I'd hit a brick wall with it but now all of a sudden I've been getting bursts of inspiration." Cassandra got up and retrieved a wide table with legs you could vary in height. Before she'd been using a normal desk since she was tall enough sitting to not need a chair.
Cassandra sat back down and picked her son up by his waist "Woah mom what are you doing" before sitting him between her large thighs. She placed the table over their legs in front of them before setting her laptop on it.

"There, now we both see the screen." Cassandra said and slid her arm around Chad's waist and pulling him against her.
Chad felt her big boobs pushing into his back "So comfy" he thought.
"I know this is a bit awkward for us but we'll have to make do" his mom kissed the back of his head "Now I need your help in typing out equations related to my project okay?"
"Okay mom. Think I'll understand any of it?" Chad laughed.
His mom was honest with him "No you won't but that's why I'm going to be teaching you. You're a long way off from grasping this stuff right now but with your big mom on the case I'll have you designing your own stuff eventually. I believe in you."

"You really think I can learn all this? Its a lot to take in" Chad found the entire thing daunting.
His mom kissed his head again "You can. You're more than smart enough, I know you weren't exactly intending to follow in my footsteps at least I didn't think you wanted to. Did you?"
"I dunno, I'm sixteen and wasn't sure what I wanted yet. I've always been interested in the stuff you do but you were busy with it and I didn't want to bother you." Chad shrugged and read the info he saw on the screen in front of him. He had no idea what any of it meant.

"Chad if you were interested you should have said something. I always hoped one of you would take an active interest in my work but no one spoke up so I assumed..." Cassandra felt guilty about not simply asking her children about it "I would have happily made time for us if you'd said."
"Oh, sorry mom. I think Claire might want to be involved as well but she's afraid of failing in front of you. Maybe you could teach her and me. I know it's asking a lot..." his mom interrupted him "No I don't mind. I'd love for you both to be involved in all this. We can all do this together. You can be my assistants, we can change the world."

Chad grinned "Yeah we could really change the world together. I wonder what we could build?" His mom clapped her hands, causing Chad to jump "Oh sorry sweetie, that was a little louder than intended. I gotta be careful now I'm so big."
"Its okay mom, no harm done. I can tell you're excited about this."

Chad spent the next hour helping his mother work, typing out various equations for her. She was revising a lot of her work, correcting and improving upon her original design. Chad wished he understood and could help her but he knew that would come in time "Baby steps Chad baby steps."

"Okay you I think you've done enough for one night." Cassandra stretched her arms and legs, Chad felt her thighs bulge against him as she did so.
"You sure mom? I don't mind doing more." Chad didn't feel tired and he was comfy where he was.
"Nah uh, you need some rest. We're having that barbecue tomorrow and then in the evening we'll be starting your lessons." his mom moved her laptop and the table from in front of him.
Chad leaned back into her "But I'm so comfy here I don't want to move. Can we stay a bit longer?"

"Uh, fine." Cassandra said and wrapped her large arms around him "You like being with me that much? Most guys your age wouldn't want to spend so much time with their moms."
"I'm not most guys and I love being with you. All of this has made it clear to me how much I do." Chad sank into his mothers warm embrace.
"Love you to baby. So what do you honestly think will happen? Think we'll all keep growing?"
Chad wasn't sure how to approach this "I.. honestly probably considering the way things are going. Someone is bound to come check on us eventually then..."
Cassandra sighed "All hell will break loose. I guess the government will become involved, then who knows what will happen. They'll probably want to quarantine us."
"Experiment on you... I might never see you again if they take you away. I don't want to lose you mom" Chad was getting emotional. There was so much he still hadn't considered "Stupid, stupid. You should have thought about this shit." he fumed inside.

"I won't be going anywhere. You won't lose me Chad, I'll do anything and I mean anything to protect my babies. No matter what it takes I'll protect you forever." Cassandra assured her son. "No matter how far you have to go?" he asked her.
"No matter how far or... how big, I won't let anyone hurt you." Cassandra stated.
"You're willing to grow even bigg.. I mean larger? How big are you willing to get?" Chad was curious, he needed to know her answer.
"As big as I have to. I know it might be scary I'm willing to grow bigger but I wouldn't harm you. No matter how big I am I'll still be your mom" Cassandra hugged him tighter "It might be terrifying if you see me crushing things to keep you safe, but I will go that far if it means keeping you all safe."

"You'd actually crush people? Kill for us if it came to that?" Chad's heart beat a little faster as his mom spoke.
"Yes, I've always told myself I'd kill to protect you but then what parent wouldn't? You may be disturbed by what I'm saying but you can understand me right?" his mom was worried she'd end up scaring him away with such talk.
She was relieved when he said "I'm not scared of you mom. I understand what you're saying. I.. I'd kill for you as well, if someone wanted to hurt any of you I'd kill them."
Cassandra ruffled his hair "I hope you never have to go that far. I don't want you going through something like that."

"Uh, if you need to grow I guess I'd have to help you wouldn't I. You'd need someone to will you larger. I'll do it if I have to, even if it means you grow into a god and I'm just a mortal in your shadow." Chad thought he'd better tell her some of the truth.
"You'll never be just a mortal to me. You're my little boy no matter what." Cassandra was worried how this was affecting Chad's mental state. "Would he really start seeing me as a god?" she was definitely worried "I'd just end up losing him in a different manner if that happened. I have to make sure he still see's me as mom."

Chad thought he'd change the subject for a moment "So mom, what helped you get inspiration for fixing that reactor design?"
"Hmm, I'm not entirely sure. Since I grew I feel like I'm understanding things better than I ever have before. You don't think?"
she knew Chad had guessed the answer by now.
"You're brain might be affected by the size change. Seems like the big, uh, the taller you get the smarter you'll be. I guess all that extra grey matter will come in handy." he said "We can really change the world in so many ways. Who knows how smart you'll end up, just imagine what you'd be capable of."

"How would I get anything done? If I'm huge I'll be even smarter yes but I'd be incapable of actually using it effectively. I'd be useless." Cassandra huffed in frustration.
"You'd have me duh. There wouldn't be any limit to what you could learn, hopefully we'd be able to create some sort of implant so you could use a computer just by thinking." Chad bounced up and down slightly "Until then I could act as your hands, doing everything you couldn't."
"You're really trying to make the best of this aren't you? I guess if you can then so will I. We'll be a tag team then if that happens." Cassandra started to feel better now after Chad's pep talk.
"We'll be an unstoppable team mom. We'd have Claire to." Chad's mind was racing, he was laying the ground work with her now just as he'd been planning. "We'd have to deal with any government stuff first, they'll probably attack you if you don't play ball."

"I know and like I said I'll do whatever it takes to protect you. I'll be the goddess of this whole fucking world if I have to, because no one is taking you from me." Cassandra meant every word. "I'll make them worship me if that's what it takes" she mused inside.
Chad's only response was "Cool. Having a goddess for a mom doesn't sound so bad."
125331111111111111111111111111.title: Burning the candle at both ends

1253311111111111111111111111111.content:
Chad kissed his mom goodnight and headed upstairs. He wasn't going to bed though, no, he needed to check on his new initiates.
He sat down and logged into his new website. He was still trying to convince the other two candidates to join them. Pixie sweet was proving to be even more difficult than he thought she'd be "Come on girl." he said aloud. Mighty mite had been a lot more receptive. He, or maybe she, Chad didn't know for sure, hadn't taken much convincing at all.

"I'd love to join your group. Who's this goddess of frost anyway? she a user like us or just a mascot?"

"I think she's whatever you need her to be Mighty. We are her children now and she loves us dearly, we are like icicles that have formed from her skin and fallen to earth."

"That's so cool, pun intended. We can be her representatives and spread her love to as many as we can."

Chad was a little disturbed by how quickly Mighty mite had bought into this whole thing "Guy's clearly three fries short of a happy meal. But then I did want people who were easy to manipulate."


"Yes Mighty. In time we will spread her love to the whole world. She will encase the world in ice and create a frozen paradise for her children. We will lead the way."

Chad couldn't believe what he was typing "Uh, the hell am I doing with my life? Still, I've come this far, need to keep going."

Chad went back and forth with mighty for a while. When he finally shut down his PC it was 3am "Fuck sake. I need to manage my time better."
He was exhausted as her stumbled towards his room with Claire. He found her still sleeping where he'd left her and admired how beautiful she was "I love you babe. Want you to get bigger and be the goddess you deserve to be." Chad was so tired he didn't realize he was talking out loud. He crawled under the covers and snuggled his way between her arms and rested his head in the crook of her neck "You're gonna get so much bigger. You and mom gonna be goddesses. Bigger and bigger."

Chad drifted off to sleep as Claire grew again but she didn't wake.

Cassandra was still in office thinking to herself, she preferred being in here right now. The events of the past two weeks had put a strain on her relationship with Tyrone. She was mostly focused on the kids and her work so she didn't have much time for him. Last night was actually the first time they'd spent together in a while and even that involved the kids as well.

Cassandra lay on the floor, her mind racing with new ideas. Chad had been right, she was smarter, she thought about what he'd said. "Implants huh. Those would be some advanced cybernetics, not really my area of expertise." she mulled it over and over in her mind. "But if I keep getting smarter as I gro.. woah!"

Cassandra felt a growth spurt come on, leaving her over twelve feet in height. Fortunately she was naked, unfortunately her poncho no longer fit her. "Who the fuck did it this time?" She looked at the door then at her hips "Shit, can I even get out of here now?"
She crawled over to the door. She could have stood if she wanted, their mansion had pretty high ceilings in most rooms, but she couldn't be bothered.
Cassandra opened the door and could still fit through "Thank fuck. I'm already confined to this fucking house, I do not need to be corralled up in a single fucking room."

Cassandra backed up into her office "Uh, I bet it was Daniel. How long can I keep him and Tyrone in the dark?"
She lay back down on the floor, her body illuminated by a corner lamp giving her skin a slight glow.
Cassandra knew Chad was right about someone checking on them eventually and that they were only going to get bigger.

She thought about how she was going to tackle things with whatever government organizations came their way. She knew that she'd have to grow more to fight them easier, she wasn't worried about getting hurt.
Cassandra knew something the others didn't "We can't get hurt as far as I know." When she'd seen Claire fall last night she'd seen her daughter hit her head "She didn't even notice, her head should have been bleeding from the way she fell."

Cass (I'll just call her this from now on) hadn't said anything at the time. She'd rushed to Claire's side expecting to find blood but there was nothing, Claire didn't even feel it as she hit the table edge.
Afterwards Cass had gone to the kitchen and collected a sharp knife before shutting herself in her office. She wanted to test something to be sure of what she'd seen "Here goes nothing." She dragged the knife across her skin, putting more than enough pressure to draw blood and yet "Nothing. No pain, no cut and no blood. I'm invulnerable."

She tested a few other sharp objects but it all ended the same way. Nothing could break her skin. She touched something mildly hot and worked her way up to boiling water. Cass had actually plunged her hand into a jug of boiling water and felt nothing but the water wetting her hand. She could tell it was boiling but it didn't harm her. "Neat" she inspected her hand.

"Chad was right about us being unstoppable, just not in the way he meant at the time. Chad..." Cass grew upset "He's not growing like us... he's completely helpless if something happens to him. He could still get hurt."
She pushed herself up onto her elbows, a determined scowl on her face "No, I will never let them hurt him" she growled "I'll crush them, I'll fucking crush anyone who tries to hurt my baby."
"As long as I'm between them and him they can't hurt him. But what happens if I get so big I can't see him? I won't be able to protect him anymore." Cass was unaware that this wouldn't be a problem in the future and that her senses would increase in strength as she grew, allowing her to still interact safely with her son.

Chad was fully aware and wasn't at all concerned of course.

"How could I make sure he stays out of harms way?" Cass was adamant she'd find someway to keep him safe "Even if it means locking him away from everyone else." She knew he'd probably feel betrayed if she did such a thing "what else can I do? I'm his mom and I have to protect him."

As she lay back down again she imagined how things would go when they inevitably discovered. She saw her family and herself standing at the end of their driveway, they were thirty feet tall at this point. Chad was back in the house staying out of sight.
There were military personnel demanding they come with them. Cass snarled that they were going nowhere, they weren't going to become lab rats in some facility. Again they were told to come or they'd be taken by force "Bring it" Cass smirked.

One of the soldiers got skittish and fired his weapon at Claire, she wasn't injured but she was pissed "You little shit, you fucking shot me. I'll fucking kill you." Claire stepped forward and raised her foot above the terrified soldier. The order was given for the others to open fire but they accomplished nothing as Claire brought her foot down, crushing the tiny man into a bloody pulp "Fucking insect." she screamed.

Cass rolled her eyes as the soldiers continued to fire at them, they'd even been firing a couple of fifty cal's at them. She stomped over to the vehicles in question and picked one up before hurling into a group of fleeing men.
She smiled at the carnage she was causing and looked down at the other Humvee "you know I think its time we showed you what we're capable of" Cass looked over her shoulder "Come on lets do this."

Her family nodded and smiled at each other "Bigger" they said in unison and began to grow "Bigger, Bigger."
"Yes bigger and badder" Cass roared and picked up the Humvee as she grew "mm, you know I wonder what mortals taste like." She ripped open the vehicle and began shaking it above her open mouth. She'd hit sixty feet at this point and was still growing, faster than the others who were currently fifty feet tall.
The first of the Humvee's occupants fell into her mouth, her jaws snapped shut and began to chew "mm, yummy humans" Cass said, allowing blood to run out of her mouth, terrifying the remaining soldiers.

"Shit they're getting bigger" someone screamed, adding to the speed of their growth. "Yes, we're getting bigger humans, watch as your new gods take their rightful place in this world. Come on I need more growth, bigger" Cass boomed, ordering her family to make her bigger faster. They'd agreed she'd be the biggest of them, she was always in charge anyway. "Say it for me my loves"

"Bigger and badder" they said, increasing Cass's size yet again "Bigger and badder mom" Daniel laughed. "That's right baby make mommy Bigger and badder." Cass blew her son a kiss.
"We're all just getting bigger and badder, bigger and badder" Cass began to dance, Humvee still in hand. Claire whooped and clapped "Fuck yeah mom, show those fuckers how much bigger and badder you are."

Chad could see all of this and shook his head "Really mom?"
