12533111111111111111111111111111.content:
Cass continued her dance and started holding the Humvee like a microphone "We're so much bigger and badder, bigger and badder, we'll be so much bigger and badder, bigger and badder."

Chad decided to leave the house and try to watch the show up close "Bigger and badder, bigger and badder. Ah now I'm doing it. Stupid song." he jogged as he sang "Bigger, bigger, gotta make them bigger."

The rest of her family watched Cass's performance, laughing at her bizarre display but still willing her bigger. The whole family's growth picked up speed as more people saw them and kept mentioning how they were growing bigger.
"Fuck yeah we're so powerful" Claire boomed and turned towards the house, intending to wave at Chad, who she spotted coming down the driveway.
Concern spread across her face and she moved towards him. Claire carefully placed her foot in front of her tiny brother, stopping him from continuing "what the hell are you doing? You shouldn't be out here." Claire crouched down and extended he hand, they'd been practicing when they were smaller so hey both knew how this worked.

"I wanted to see what the fuck was going on. Is mom seriously singing with a truck?" Chad sat in the middle of Claire's palm as she turned back towards the street so he could see.
"Yep, its kinda weird but I think it works." Claire lowered her voice so it wouldn't bother her brother. She was still growing as she held Chad, a blissful look came across her face "This never gets old" she whispered. She looked at Chad who was happily repeating "Bigger, bigger, bigger and bigger" to help her along.
"I think bro, you missed out a word there" Claire grinned. Chad groaned "Don't you fucking dare" as she held him closer to her body and began a slow dance.
"Bigger and badder, bigger and badder. Come on Chad, sing it with me." Claire giggled. "Get fucked, oh and bigger." he made a disgusted snort noise.

Cass was 150 feet tall now and showed no signs of stopping. Her family lagged behind even further behind at 100 feet.
She caught out of the corner of her eye, Claire was holding something close to her and giggling. Cass stopped her song and dance, the walked over to Claire "let me guess, he disobeyed me and came out anyway? Chad what did I say about staying out of sight?"

Claire presented her brother to their gigantic parent "I'm fine mom, Claire won't let anything happen to me. Right Claire?" Chad yelled. "Right dumbass. I'll keep ya safe and sound."
"Uh huh. What if they use missiles or something, the blast might still hit you even if Claire is trying to shield you? What if you get hit by shrapnel?" Cass was annoyed at her tiny son "I just want you to be safe okay. You can stay out now I guess while we're still here but when we go elsewhere you go inside and don't answer the door to anyone. Understood?"

Chad nodded and gave a thumbs up "I know, i remember the plan. Stay put until you've taken over, then you'll come get me."
Cass smiled "Good boy. Mommy wouldn't want anything happening to her precious little man" she cooed at him.
"Uh, mom could you not." Chad squirmed.

"Oh I can and I will my little baby boy." Cass teased him. "You know what he loves mom? He loves it when you sing." Claire put a finger over Chads mouth before he could protest.
"Oh really? well then I shan't disappoint." Cass strutted into the street and posed, then started singing again "I'll just keep getting bigger and badder, bigger and badder, so much bigger and badder, bigger and badder."

Chad glared at Claire, who simply shrugged her shoulders "come on its making her happy. When was the last time mom could cut loose and have fun like this?" she prodded him.
Chad looked towards his singing mother "like this? Uh, never I think." "You know what I mean dumbass."
"Yeah, yeah. Why don't you just grow bigger and bigger. Then maybe I can have some peace and quiet." Chad turned his nose up at his sister.

Claire stroked her brothers head with her finger "We'll be back. We ain't leaving you behind forever I promise."
"I know, once you're done making yourselves gods you'll be back. Probably way bigger than you are now." Chad stretched across his sisters palm.
"True. I'll be a goddess and you'll still be my dumbass little brother. Claire smiled. Chad flipped her off. Claire's face softened "Love you ya know." "I know, love you to."

Cass finally had enough of singing "Alright its time to go now. Claire take Chad home. Then we'll make this world ours."
Chad waved to his family as Claire walked him back home. His mother blew him a kiss as they left and mouthed "Love you baby."
Chad was dropped off at the front door and and looked up at his nude sister, they were all naked and they'd all gotten used to it. "See you later kay."
Claire smiled down and said "Love you baby bro. See you soon." Chad watched his family leave then went back inside.

Cass was 250 feet tall now, her family were 150. They stomped towards the city center, not caring what they crushed under their expanding feet. People must have been taking notice of the fact Cass was bigger than the others and voicing it out loud.
This increased the size gap even further making the others nervous that they'd be left behind by the growing goddess
"Fuck mom is getting way bigger than us" Daniel whispered "If this keeps up..."
"we'll be fine" Claire patted him on the back "we all knew mom would be biggest right dad?"
"Yeah, it suits your mother just fine." Tyrone stared at his wife's swelling body and was hypnotized by her jiggling ass cheeks.

Cass had a malevolent grin on her face, at over 600 feet tall she towered over almost all the buildings in the city. She wanted to get to the center so she could make a big show and statement. She forced her way between the skyscrapers, smashing her hips into the buildings she passed. As more and more people saw her and talked about her getting bigger, her size increased even faster.
Cass stood in the city center now, ruined skyscrapers behind her "Alright insects, here's how its gonna be. I am your goddess now, this whole world is mine. As you can see I just keep growing and growing and I won't stop unless you give into my demands." She knew all eyes were on her as she passed 1000 feet.

Claire crossed her arms and pouted, she and the others were still only 300 feet tall.
"Uh, aren't we all supposed to be gods or something?" Daniel asked "moms acting like she's the only one."
"I'm sure she knows what she's doing." Tyrone said, still hypnotized by his growing wife.
"She'd better" Claire huffed.

"That's right mortals, make your goddess grow. You will all worship me like the insects you are" Cass roared as she passed 2000 feet "Alright that's enough" she proceeded to inform everyone who was watching what triggered their growth. It spread across the world as Cass explained the word was now forbidden. It took a while to sink in but eventually she stopped growing at 2500 feet. While her family were 500.

Cass flexed her body for the viewers around the planet she now owned "This is true divinity, gaze upon your goddess. I am perfection incarnate."
She looked down and spotted her family "Hey my loves. Enjoy my show?" she boomed. Tyrone was to entranced to say anything.
"So mom, what now? Is that it then?" Claire shouted up, they didn't even reach her knees.
"No Claire this far from over. Do you think they'll give up so easily? No we must crush their hopes and break their spirits." Cass told her daughter "We should split up. Claire you com with me and Tyrone you take Daniel."

"Split up? We're we going mom?" Daniel asked, waving for her attention. Cass crouched and kissed him on the head "You and your dad will got to California, I want you to destroy everything you come across. You'll demolish every city in the state. Can you do that for me baby?" Daniel nodded.

"Claire, you and I will head north. We'll destroy the eastern seaboard as we go. We'll completely destroy Washington." Cass grinned.
"Okay mom I'm ready. Lets go!" Claire jumped and landed, causing a tremor.

The family went their separate ways. They destroyed and killed everyone and everything in their path. Cass intended to make an example to the rest of the world what would happen to anyone who opposed them. Eventually the military resorted to nukes on them, this did nothing to stop the massive goddess and her family and eventually half of the country's population lay dead.

Over the next couple of years they conquered the rest of the planet, nothing could stop their onslaught so most gave up quickly, those that didn't... It did not end well for them.
12533111111111111111111111111111.title: Cassandra day dreams more

125331111111111111111111111111111.content:
Claire eventually decided to leave the others and go home to check on her brother. She found him right where they'd left him, he'd been living in the bunker they'd built for him before they grew to big. Chad was astounded at his sisters size, he was about toe height to her "Uh, well this is awkward... I can't hear you from up here" Claire boomed "If you can get to my ear we'll talk."

Claire lay down on the ground next to their house and hoped Chad could somehow climb up to her. By some miracle he succeeded and he began chatting to her "So, how was your trip. See anything nice?"
"That's the first thing you say to me? No, I missed you so much Claire, please don't leave me again." Claire let out a snort "Told you when I got back I'd be a goddess and you'd still be my dumbass little brother. I was right, now you're really little."

"Please. I'm normal and you're just jumbo sized." Chad laughed "really though, I have missed you guys. When are the others coming back?"
"Soon, they send their love. Uh, communicating with mom might be an issue." Claire said "Wait what's, oh here she comes."

They both felt the immense tremors as their mom approached. Chad managed to stick his head out of Claire's ear so he could get a better look "Holy fucking shit, moms so huge" Chad gawked as the 5000 foot tall frame of his mother came into view.
Claire and the others had mostly stayed the same but Cass had insisted on growing more. Claire was only shin height to their mom and Chad was pretty much microscopic to her.

"Well hello down there" Cass thundered "How's my little boy doing I wonder?I hope he's still with us"
"He's fine mom." Claire shouted "He's in my ear."
"Is he now? I expected him to be on the ground prostrating himself before his goddess." Cass had an amused look on her face "come on, out you come and bow before me mortal child of mine."

"What's mom talking about?" Chad asked nervously.
"I don't know. Hang on a sec." Claire said and then shouted up "what the hell mom. He's not like the others, he's family. My brother." Claire was pissed but this earned a chuckle from her mom.

"Yes he's family but he's still a mortal, he should bow before me all the same. I'm his goddess and he will love and revere me like all the other mortals." Cass said matter of factly "now put him on the ground where he belongs Claire."
Claire glared at her mother but did as she was told "Just play along for now" she whispered "I'll sort this out later. Don't even bother bowing its not like she can see you."

Chad slid out of Claire's ear and stared up at his massive mother. How could she treat him like this? After saying she'd do anything to protect him, kill to protect him. He stood with his arms crossed and did as Claire had told him, not even bothering to get on his knees.

"Is he bowing now?" Cass asked her daughter.
"Yeah mom he's bowing" Claire lied and shook her head in disgust "There happy? I'm taking him and we're going for a walk."

"Did he really bow Claire?" her mom "I hope he didn't or mommy's gonna be mad at her boy."
"What?" Claire and Chad said.
"I needed to know how the years have affected him, please tell you were lying to me. Please tell me he still see's me as mom" Cass looked a little frantic now.

Claire wasn't sure whether her mom was testing her to see if she lied. She helped Chad back into her ear and asked what he thought "Should we be honest. She might be playing me."
"She sounds pretty upset at the thought I'd bow to her. I've heard her like this before, a few years ago when you guys were much smaller." Chad responded "Ask her who's going to change the world. Then I'll know for sure."

"Um, okay then." Claire shrugged and did as instructed "Mom, Chad asked who's going to change the world? What does that mean?"
Cass's eyes went wide then she smiled "We are sweetie. Mommy needs you to be her hands down there. Although this might take much longer than we anticipated, I didn't think I'd actually get this big. Sorry baby."
"Yeah she's for real Claire." Chad smiled.

"The fuck are you two on about. Your hands mom?" Claire was confused by them both now "and no Chad didn't bow. Not like you could have know or not anyway. Uh."
"Good. He has no business bowing to anyone and if you must know, Chad is going to be my assistant as we truly change things around here, I can't exactly operate any technology myself so... and we always wanted you to join us Claire, I think its a necessity now anyway since me and Chad can't talk..." their mom looked pretty heartbroken as she said those last words.

"We'll make it work mom." Claire told her "Sure I'll join you two, someones gotta make sure you can talk."

Cass smiled and knelt down to her daughter then gently kissed her on the head "thank you babies. Mom loves you both. Lets catch up then."

Eventually the whole family was reunited, they were glad they could finally be together again. Claire made sure that Chad was kept safe as he worked, their mom had difficulty instructing them both at first but they eventually learned to manage.

Cass smiled from above as she heard the voice of her son for the first time in years. The implant worked. "Oh my baby, I've missed hearing you."
"I love you to mom" she heard in her head "So what's next?"

Cass's face curled into a wicked smirk "next? next I punish you for not bowing to your goddess like you should have."
"What?" Chad stammered "mom I don't understand, you were upset at the thought of me bowing before."
"Ah, silly mortal child. You actually thought I meant that? No you should have bowed before me like everyone else, all of this would have still happened. All you had to do was give me the worship I expect from those like you. Now you can do it right this time, bow to your goddess." Cass commanded.

Chad sank to his knees, she could see him now. "Lower, prostrate yourself before your goddess." Chad obeyed and placed his face on the ground.
"I did it mom, I bowed okay. I'm sorry I lied to you, I love you." Chad whimpered.
"Hush now, I love you to. But you know that there's only one punishment for mortals that disobey me, I'm not giving you special treatment. You disobeyed and now you'll pay like any other mortal." Cass sounded cold. "Goodbye baby, mommy loves you"

"Mommy please don't, you said you'd protect me no matter what." Chad screamed as Cass raised her foot over him and with a cruel grin, crushed him with it.

Cass woke up sweating "No, no, my baby." She was still in her office, she'd fallen asleep. She stared at her foot she'd used to crush her son and she wanted to cut it off.
"Its just a stupid nightmare." she said to herself. "it started off so well, why'd it have to turn like that. I'd never hurt him, would I?" She felt sick and ran to the downstairs bathroom and began puking into the toilet.
"No I will never fucking harm him. No matter what I'll protect him and I will kill anyone who tries" she gritted her teeth and washed her face with cold water.

Cass returned to her office and lay on the floor again "I'll have to find some way to take him with me. Some way I can keep him safe and close." she racked her brain for an answer but none were forthcoming. She looked at the clock "6am. Better get some more rest, got a long day ahead of us."
Cass eventually nodded of again, this time her dreams were a lot more pleasant as she thought of how much she loved her family.

"I'll protect you Chad."
125331111111111111111111111111111.title: continued

1253311111111111111111111111111111.content:
Chad felt like shit as Claire nudged him awake, he could barley lift himself.
"You don't look so good" Claire looked concerned and kissed him "what time did you come to bed exactly?"
"I dunno, about three I think. Chad said groggily "let me sleep more, I don't wanna get up." He turned over and buried is face in his pillow.
"You shouldn't have been up so late. Not when we're supposed to having a barbecue today, remember?" Claire sounded a little disappointed in him "you knew our little bro has been looking forward to this, so get your ass up. I'll carry you out there if I have to."
"Its not like it'll be until later, right? I won't miss it I promise." Chad practically whined.
"Fine one more hour, then I'm dragging you out, ready or not." Claire slapped his ass, earning a yelp from her brother.
"Kay, just, yeah ya know..." Chad wasn't exactly being coherent as he fell back to sleep. "Dumbass" Claire said and stood up."Wah? I'm fucking taller" she looked down at her body, she estimated she'd grown another foot. "I'm nine feet fucking tall, ugh. Who the fuck grew me?." She looked around her incredibly spacious room and then at her bed "I'm gonna need new a bed now, I won't in it much longer. At this rate I ain't gonna fit in the house much longer."

Claire thought about what it would be like, her head breaking through the roof as she grew, a smile on her face. "Mm hot" she looked at her sleeping lover "I'm fucking your brains out later."
She walked towards her bathroom and went in "great, how the fuck am I supposed to shower?" Claire just about squeezed inside and crouched down as she turned on the water "stupid bed, stupid shower, stupid fucking growth" she grumbled and washed herself.

Downstairs Cass was having similar problems "I can't get in the bath or shower anymore, great that's all I need."
She pondered for a moment and had an idea "Well, there's always the hose outside. Its warm out right now so it shouldn't feel to bad."
She was about to go up the stairs then stopped "can the stairs even handle my weight at this point?" Cass put one foot on the first step and heard it groan "Should have had stone steps or something. Fuck. Anyone awake up there?"
She heard shuffling and then Daniel walked into view. His jaw dropped as he saw his giant naked mom "Mom did you grow again?"
"Yeah baby. Um, could you do me a favor and go get some stuff from my room. I don't think I can come upstairs anymore." Cass gave him an awkward smile as she asked.

"Sure mom, let me guess you want stuff to wash with?" It wasn't hard for Daniel to work out she'd still need to wash in the mornings "be right back." he scampered off to collect her things.
Cass smiled to herself "Such a bright boy. He's not stupid, even though he thinks he is." A few minutes later Daniel came back with an armful of stuff "not sure what you usually use so I grabbed the whole lot." he said as he carefully made his way down to her "Um, here you go." he looked away sheepishly, he was almost eye level with his moms crotch.

"Sorry baby." Cass said as he handed her everything he had "I know its strange me being so big and I don't have anything that I can wear right now. This might be something you'll have to get used to. Thank you for helping me baby."
Cass leaned down and kissed his head before walking out into the garden.
Daniel was used to seeing his family members naked at times, they weren't really bothered by such things but this was bizarre. Daniel was the same height as Chad now "I've barely grown anymore. Maybe its stopped for me, I hope its stopped."
He still didn't want to grow like the others but "Mom being a giant is still so cool."

Cass stood out the garden washing herself with the garden hose "I'm glad no one can see me, this is ridiculous, I... oh"
Cass had gotten an idea and went back inside "Daniel?" she called out. Her son came running as she called him "need anything else mom?"
"Yes. Could help your mom again please? I need you to take one end of the garden hose and attach it to the tap in the bathroom facing the back." Cass waved for him to follow her and they went outside. She detached the hose from the outdoor tap and rolled it up before handing it to her son "thank you baby. I don't know what I'd do without you." "No problem mom" he smiled and took off running.

It didn't take Daniel long to attach the hose and begin feeding it out of the bathroom window "Here you go mom" he yelled "Should I turn the tap on now?"
"Yes please" Cass answered as she grabbed her end and walked onto the grass. A moment later warm water began spraying out of the end "much better" Cass thought and went back to cleaning herself.
"How hot is it? Should I add cold water?" Daniel yelled as he leaned out of the window.
"No its fine thank you" Cass wasn't concerned considering what she'd learned yesterday and continued her makeshift shower. She had to use may more shower gel than usual "I'll have to send Chad for more stuff. At my size I'll stink pretty bad if I don't keep clean"

Chad was woken by Claire an hour later just as she'd said she would. She was whacking him with a pillow "come on up. Your goddess commands you to get out of bed. Up."
"The fuck you crazy moose?" Chad tried to shield himself. "Moose? I may be big but I ain't no moose. I'm a powerful goddess who demands worship and obedience from her lover boy." Claire growled and wrapped her arms around Chad's waist. She carried his exhausted limp body into the bathroom, then proceeded to dunk him into the bath. Chad screamed as he hit the cold water "Shit its fucking freezing, get me the fuck out of here." He scrambled out into Claire's arms and she cuddled him o warm him up.

"I told you to get up" Claire giggled before letting him go. Chad didn't respond and walked out. Claire heard their bedroom door open and slam shut "Fuck. Maybe I shouldn't have done that."
She sighed, wrapped herself in her tarp and ran after him. Claire assumed he was currently in his room "Old room" she corrected herself and knocked "Chad come on, I'm sorry babe. I'll make it up to you I promise, you can fuck my ass all night if you want. I know how much you love being inside my booty, we can even try it bare back."

This got Chad's attention and he opened the door, he still looked pissed off. "Bare back? You sure that's a good idea? Also are you taller?" He didn't remember his sleep deprived ramblings from last night.
Claire stooped down and kissed her grumpy lover "Yeah I'm bigger." she turned around and smacked her ass cheeks "especially my sexy booty. Don't worry I know how to get myself ready for that kind of sex, I'll be nice and spotless inside."
Claire whooped as she felt Chad shove his face into her ass crack "Hey, naughty boy, not until tonight. We've got shit to do now, so go shower and then we'll eat."

Chad did as he was told and then joined Claire fifteen minutes later. They headed downstairs and into the kitchen "Holy shit" Claire screamed as she saw her mother outside in the garden.
"What? Oh fuck." Chad swore as he set eyes on her as well "Who the fuck did that? Is she showering with the hose?"
"I barely fit in our shower, there's no way she can now." Claire opened the back door and went out "Mom what happened?"

Cass washed off the last of the soap and turned towards her now taller daughter "I could ask the same thing. Looks like someone grew us both." She wiped as much water from herself as she could "Chad honey could you go grab me a towel please, or maybe two, no three."

Chad laughed "sure mom. Three big towels for a big mom." "Hey, who you calling big" she yelled as he ran back inside.
She looked Claire up and down "If this keeps up... Ah, what are we gonna do?"
"I'm not sure mom. I like the idea of being huge to be honest but... there's so many draw backs as well." Claire dropped her shoulders and shook her head.
"I know what you mean. I feel powerful being so big but this can't go on, where we live?" Cass put her hand on Claire's shoulder "There's also something I wanted to talk to you about. I'll be tutoring you brother from today and, well, I'd like for you to join us."

"You want to teach me?" Claire was taken aback by her mothers offer "you actually want to teach me?"
"That's what I said yes. I want to pass on what I know to you two, you're both more than capable of handling it. That and it'll give us something to focus on besides this." Cass hoped Claire would agree.
"Okay mom" Claire finally said "I would, I'd like spending more time with you mom."
Cass hugged her daughter "Mom you're still wet!" "Sorry, I'm just excited I get to teach you and Chad. Speaking of him."

Chad came running out with a pile of towels in his arms "I got you more than you asked for, just in case, ya know."
Cass took them and began drying herself "Thanks sweetie. Why don't you two go eat and I'll be in shortly."

Claire and Chad went back inside and started breakfast. Claire decided to ask Chad something that had been on her mind for a while now "Do you think they suspect anything? About us I mean."
"I don't think so. Kinda surprised actually, considering I'm in our room all night. But then no one has actually checked on us." Chad shrugged unconcerned.

Their mom finally joined them inside and began making her own food. Being so big now she found it difficult to handle things and as she held a pot of boiling hot coffee she accidentally lost her grip on it. It fell onto the table and smashed open, sending its contents all over Chad's exposed arm.

"Chad!" Cass cried.
1253311111111111111111111111111111.title: cleanliness is next to godliness

12533111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Chad I'm so sorry." Cass crouched down beside her son and hugged him "you need to get cold water on that. Come on." She started guiding him out of his seat when she heard.

"I'm fine mom." Chad stared at his arm, there were no burns, no pain. Nothing.
"What? How are you fine..." Cass's eyes went wide as she realized "You're affected to."
Chad looked up at her confused "Affected? By what?"
"You're invulnerable, just like the rest of us." she whispered "watch" Cass grabbed a knife and held it to her arm.
Claire screamed "Mom what the fuck are you doing" as Cass dragged the knife across her skin.
"See it's fine. I'm not hurt, I figured it out last night." she addressed Claire "Remember when you fell yesterday?" Claire nodded.
"Well did you notice you hit your head? You should have been bleeding and yet nothing happened, you didn't even notice it."

"I did? I know I landed funny but I didn't notice I'd smacked my head into something." Claire tried to remember what happened.
Chad spoke up "You did say you didn't feel anything when you fell." "Huh you're right" Claire smiled "We can't be hurt then. Wait but if you can't be hurt why aren't you growing like us?"
Chad shrugged "No idea. Maybe I'm not getting everything you guys have, the fact I am affected in some way though is interesting."

Cass felt relief wash over her and thought "He can't be hurt, that means no matter what happens he'll be safe. I don't have to worry about harming him, I'll never have to leave him no matter how big I get now." She was practically on the verge of dancing with happiness but decided not to do that in front of her children, not when she was naked "Doubt they'd appreciate my boobs flying around."

Claire grabbed a knife and tried what her mom had. "Nothing" she said amazed "We don't have to worry about the military or something attacking us. Even if we grow massive they can't stop us." Claire was starting to feel more and more like a goddess.

Chad grinned to himself "I almost remember this from my vision, it makes sense, I know I'm immortal but then..." He remembered what happened to him and the others "But mom ate us and we died. Maybe we can be hurt but only by each other" he pondered a little more "Or maybe because mom was so powerful at that point she drained the magic out of us, leaving us defenseless. She did say she'd found a way to control the others sizes, makes sense it would extend to other things."

Chad realized he'd have to focus more on learning magic "Need to get back to madame Olivia. Ugh, so much shit to do."

Claire and Chad cleaned up the kitchen, their mom was nervous about trying to do anything to help.
Daniel and Tyrone eventually came downstairs but the others said nothing of what had happened, they didn't want them asking to may questions at this stage.

"Chad, Claire. Can you come with me a moment, I'd like to discuss how we're going to proceed with me teaching you." Cass nodded her head for them to follow her.
They reached her office and Cass went over with them what things they'd be learning. There was a lot on the list of things she'd be teaching, leaving the two more than a little intimidated about what lay ahead.

As they were talking they heard a bell, someone was at their front gate. "Who could that be?" Cass went and checked the cameras at the gate "A delivery driver?"
Chad poked his head under her arm. He now vaguely remembered in his tiredness induced haze that he'd ordered something on Amazon last night "I think that's for me"
"What have you been ordering? You should have mentioned it." Cass gave him a stern look. "I only just remembered. I was really tired last night and I'm not even sure what it is." Chad lifted his hands then dropped them. "I'll go get it okay."

Chad opened the gate and accepted the package then jogged back to the house. He rejoined his mom and Claire in the office, parcel in hand.
"Well lets see it" Claire said. Chad opened the box and found "It's a keyboard, for people with disabilities."
"A keyboard?" Cass walked beside him and looked at it "Looks like one with extra large buttons... Chad did you buy this for me?"
"I guess I must have. Well, here ya go mom, now you can still use your computer. At least for the time being." He handed her the box.

"Aw. Thanks so much sweetie, you're so thoughtful." Cass hugged him, smothering him with her huge body. "Oops I forgot I'm naked. Sorry"
"Its fine mom, I'm not bothered." Chad hugged her waist.

They spent some time setting everything they needed up for their lessons this evening. Before long it was early afternoon "Hey everyone, barbecue time." Daniel stuck his head round the door "Dads already setting everything up."
Cass shooed them all in front of her "Come on lets go then. It'll be nice to relax outside for a change, anyone getting in the pool with me?"
"Can you even fit in the pool now mom?" Chad teased "You might displace all the water" he took off running as his mom yelled "I'll get you little man. I'll still fit in there just you wait"
Claire ran after Chad laughing "better be careful or there might be a tsunami then. Watch out its a sea momster."

Cass grumbled and stomped after them "Er, if I'm a sea momster I'm going to eat you both like one." She winked at Daniel who was still walking beside her "What do you think, should I eat them?" "Yeah mom, you can't let them get away with that. Imprison them in your giant belly to teach them a lesson." He laughed.
"You're right, I'll be sending them on a one way trip down my throat, care to join them? I don't think two tiny morsels are enough for me" Cass rubbed her stomach and licked her lips.
"No mom, don't eat me." Daniel played along and ran outside. "I'm gonna eat you all my little ones" Cass roared and chased after them laughing.

Cass caught up with Daniel and scooped him up "I have you now, time to go in the big bad momsters belly" she held him up and opened her mouth "ahhh" she said moved him towards it.
"No momster please don't eat me. I'll be good" Daniel laughed and squirmed.

The others watched them play and laughed, it was like all their problems were falling away. Nothing else mattered right now except them being together as a family.
Claire stood behind Chad and wrapped her arms around him "Wanna go in my belly?" she giggled. "There are worse things that could happen trust me. Your sexy belly doesn't sound so bad." Chad leaned back into her "I'm invulnerable like you so who knows..."
"You're not actually suggesting I eat you if I'm ever big enough?" Claire was curious about it though, he was right. He wouldn't be harmed if she ate him. "You really want to travel through my whole digestive system? You know where you'd end up"

"Yeah, right inside your massive ass. You were right when I said I loved being inside it." Chad thought about wiggling his way through Claire's colon "Either way if you're ever big enough I'm crawling inside your ass. How could I not give that a whirl?"
"Okay, you better not complain once your in there because you're not coming out till you satisfy me, got it?" Claire was actually interested in what they could do together with such a size difference "If I ever get that big I'm shoving you up my cunt. It won't hurt you so we can go as far as we want. Or at least as far as I want."

"You'll be my goddess Claire and I'll worship you how ever you want." Chad said. "I want your love dumbass, I want you to be my partner forever, my lover forever." Claire liked to role play but she didn't want him to stop being her equal in their relationship, even if she did become a giant goddess.

Cass lowered herself into the pool "see I still fit" Fortunately as they were so rich they could afford a pretty large one. Cass could still submerge herself up to her breasts in the deep end while sitting. Claire and Chad decided to get in as well, Claire was naked like their mother and Chad wore shorts.
Claire sat down, back against the side, and relaxed while Chad floated on his back in front of her. "You should try this, it'll take all the weight off your body" he suggested.
"I guess, I am pretty heavy now" she said and, with some difficulty, managed to get herself floating like Chad "That's so good."

They floated in silence together for a while, they didn't notice something moving under them.
All of a sudden a large figure began rising out of the water "Mwha ha ha ha." Cass gave an evil laugh "prepare yourselves little ones, prepare to join your brother inside my belly, you shall never escape the hunger of momster the sea goddess."
Cass cast a shadow over her children as they scrambled away from her laughing. She knelt down "prepare to be washed down my gullet" opened her mouth and half submerged it so only her upper lip was above the water.

Claire thought this was ridiculous but it was also weirdly fun "I'm being sucked in" she fake cried and allowed herself to float backwards towards her mom "nooooo" Claire submerged herself, pretending she'd been swallowed whole.
Cass stood up and laughed as she rubbed her belly "Tasty." She grinned at Chad "Then there was one." and waded towards him.
12533111111111111111111111111111111.title: Catching fire

125331111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Chad laughed and slowly backed away from his mom "You'll never take me alive." he shook his fist dramatically.
"Oh ho ho." his mom laughed "you think you can escape me little one, I'm going to eat you and there's nothing you can do to me" Cass said in her deepened her voice "you'll join your brother and sister in my belly whether you like it or not." She laughed again and reached down, her huge body casting a shadow over him.

Time seemed to slow to a crawl as Chad processed his mothers words "I'm going to eat you"
Chad's mind began swirling with memory's of his alternate future self. He saw his massive goddess mom tossing his siblings into her mouth, he remembered her indifferent attitude regarding what she'd done and not caring if eating them would actually make her powerful or not. He saw her killing his father as she used him as a sex toy and then forcing Chad to make her bigger.
Chad remembered her laughing as the immense wall of her tongue bulldozed towards him, sweeping him up into her mouth and then swallowing him whole. He could remember the feeling of her stomach acid dissolving his skin, the smell and heat inside her, and him finally drowning beneath the surface.
Then there was what followed, the screams of his siblings, the pain that wracked his very soul and his goddesses laugh as she delighted in torturing them. She spent eternity tormenting and feeding on them so she could be all powerful and she didn't care.

Chad's heart rate skyrocketed as he was overcome with conflicting emotions. He felt sorrow and rage. He felt an almost uncontrollable lust for his goddess mother and then, then he felt fear, fear of being consumed and broken down so his mom could feed on his soul and the fear of his brother and sister sharing his fate. Chad could still taste his mothers ass sweat and cum in his mouth and it threatened to drive him wild, he could feel his mind threatening to shatter as the weight of all those memory's bombarded him.

"Chad!" Cass screamed and waded faster to her son as he fell backwards into unconsciousness.
"What the fuck, Chad" Claire came around from behind her mom and rushed forward, she was terrified something was horribly wrong with him.
"Its okay I think he just fainted" Cass scooped him up in her arms and held him close, he was breathing fine she could tell "What the fuck happened?"
Claire knew how exhausted he was this morning from being up all night "I think he was up pretty late and didn't get much sleep, I should have let him stay in bed. I shouldn't have dragged him out here, its my fault." Claire was panicking now thinking she was responsible.
"Hey its okay, he choose to stay up late, you didn't force him to do anything. Chad is his own person." Cass reassured her daughter, who was on the verge of hyperventilating. Claire's eyes darted form her mother to her brother and she moved to bury her face in his wet hair "Please be okay, please be okay." she repeated over and over.

Cass placed Chad on the side of the pool. Tyrone and Daniel had run over to see what was going on "Is Chad gonna be okay mom" Daniel looked like he was about to burst into tears.

14111.content:
While driving home, Daniel's mom had asked him if he could help her carry three ceramic pots for her new plants into the house. These were large pots, each weighing over 50 pounds. But Daniel said he would do his best to carry them.

As soon as they arrived home, Daniel opened the back door to the small SUV and he tried to lift the first ceramic pot. He lifted the pot out of the SUV and he set it on the floor. The pot was very heavy! As soon as he had set the pot on the floor, Daniel was overcome by that tingling sensation again!

This time, the tingling was even more intense than the first time, which was on the soccer field. Daniel's calves started to inflate just like water balloons and it seemed like the growth just wouldn't stop! They grew bigger and bigger, growing ito big balls of muscle sticking out from the back of his legs!

His quads inflated and thickened into wide, hard pillars of cement! They became as hard as solid steel, covered suddenly and completely with thick veins which were as wide and as thick as jump ropes. Daniel's quads just exploded with muscle, especially the parts above the knees, which gained layers upon layers of muscles like tectonic plates, growing so wide that his massive legs were wider than the rest of his body!

Then came his abs! Large rows and columns of square buttons came to the surface on his lower torso, forming deep ridges like a washboard. About sixteen abdominal muscles formed over his mighty torso, followed by his ever-increasing pectorals, which increased like exploding beach balls on the upper part of his torso! His pecs grew like mighty spheres of muscle, growing into big, round plates of steel! In addition, his lats grew long and wide under his arms while his shoulders grew much wider than his waist, giving him that impressive V-shape.

Daniel's biceps inflated like helium balloons, growing into large spheres of power-balls of muscle that were implanted in his arms... to the size of bowling balls! With each movement of his fingers, his wrist, or his arm, Daniel suddenly felt how he commanded a staggering amount of physical strength which bordered on superhuman! His shoulders were like big, round and broad columns of steel, and his entire body was now covered with large spheres of muscle all over, which were as hard as concrete!

The boy bent down again and placed his hands on the edge of the large, ceramic pot. This time, it was a snap to lift the 50-pound object. Daniel's mighty muscles welcomed the challenge to lift the three pots. Daniel carried each pot into the house from the car, without breaking a sweat.

Once he got back inside, he stopped by the kitchen, where his mother saw him in his muscular physique without his shirt on.

"Thanks, sweetie! I knew you were strong enough to handle that!" mom said, as she walked up to him and kissed him on his forehead.

Somehow, reality had been changed and his mother did not find it strange at all that Daniel was so strong.

Daniel then drank a glass of water and walked back into his room where he studied his amazing muscles. All he had to do now was to show his muscles to Chad...

142121211212222.content:
"Let's try Scrabble" Chad suggested. He doubted that she knew many words but it should at least kill half an hour.

---

As Wesley watched from a tree, he knew that Chad was trying to get avoid any use of the word 'bigger'. However this game offered a world of possibilities. With a slight flick of his hand and a few quiet words, he cast a spell on the game. A wide grin slowly crept across his face. Oh this will certainly teach him he thought.

---

"Do you know how to play this game?" Chad asked the titanic six year old as they set up the board and tiles. She shook her head. "Are you good at spelling?"

She nodded. "My teacher and mummy say I'm real good. I can even spell plane. P-L-A-N-E," she said smugly.

Chad wasn't the best speller but he certainly felt that he could beat a six year old, no matter how large she was. He had to remind himself he didn't want to win but rather wanted to keep Amelia interested in the game for as long as possible. "Well you pick up seven of these tiles, put them on your small rack, and then we take turns making words and putting them on the board" this was certainly not something he played often but he was surprised at how easy it was to remember. "I'll go first." He looked at his tiles. S-A-M-E-E-F-T. After about half a minute he picked up four tiles and put down STEAM on the center tile.

"Your turn," he said to Amelia.

She looked at her tiles for a good three minutes, refusing Chad's offers of help. "Oooh, here's one!" Amelia finally said excitedly as she picked up four tiles. She started to place them in the corner before Chad stopped her.

"Sorry I forgot to mention, you're supposed to connect them to the other tiles on the board", he said as politely as he could. He couldn't help but noticed how large her hands were and how silly she looked hunched over the board.

"Hmph, this game is hard," she complained, putting her elbows on the table with a small thud and resting her head in her hands.

"We can play another one if you want," Chad responded.

"No I want to play this one!" she replied. Chad knew that she didn't like losing and would try her hardest to win. However he wanted to make sure she got the hang of the game and didn't rage quit on him.

"Let's see your tiles" he said politely. He looked at the tiles she had selected to put down. H-A-I-R. "Well here's how you would do a word like this," he said as he placed the tiles down using the A in STEAM to replace her A. "See and then you just build the words from there."

"So each word has to touch then?"

"Yes exactly." She suddenly sat upright again, taking interest in the game once more. "Now you pick up enough tiles so that you have seven." She picked up the tiles one by one as Chad looked at the time. Only another ninety minutes more of this he thought. As he looked back at Amelia picking up her tiles, Chad couldn't help but wonder, had Amelia's hair always been that long and beautiful...
142121211212222.title: Scrabble - Wesley makes her affected by any ver...

1421212112122221.content:
The game continued on for a few rounds. Chad was surprised at how invested Amelia had become in the game. She only played simple words like BOOK, MAT and TRUCK and he typically needed to help her at least once every turn, but she seemed adamant to try and do it herself. Chad was getting good at letting her think on her own for a bit and then stepping in when she seemed to be getting annoyed. He would always politely tell her that it was a good word that she did even though he was always the one to help her.

However he still couldn't find it in himself to hold back completely. Especially not when he kept getting such good letters. It was almost supernatural how good his tiles had been so far. It was his turn again and he looked at his tiles. After thinking for a few seconds, he decided to go for SMART, using an R from somewhere else to connect it. The M was also on a double letter block giving him even more points. As he sat back and started collecting his tiles, he noticed that Amelia seemed to freeze. She blinked a few times then seemingly noticed her hair for the first time. She then looked back at Chad with a look he hadn't seen before and simply asked "My turn?" to which he nodded.

Anticipating that this might take a while, Chad decided to turn on the TV though kept it on mute. He had only gone through three channels before he heard Amelia say "Done" cheerfully. He turned back, surprised, thinking it was probably a made up word. To his surprise he saw that she had actually managed to make the word AWARE on her own. He was surprised that she could come up with a word like that given that she had been having difficulty with four letter words just the turn before. However he just decided that it was probably a coincidence or that she was finally getting the hang of this game. Either way, he didn't feel so bad for doing the longer words earlier.

He looked back at his tiles and thought over them for a minute. Amelia started to hum the tune to some song he recognized but couldn't remember right at the moment. As he kept thinking the song started to get on his nerves. Eventually he asked he to stop while it was his turn.

"You can't think of any words?" she asked mockingly. "Do you want my help?" Chad coughed, trying to contain his laughter. He had to be careful around Amelia when she was probably twice his strength now.

He finally politely declined saying "No thanks" then looked back at his tiles. Suddenly he noticed a combination that wasn't obvious before. Taking six letters off his rack, he played STAMINA. It was his longest word yet and he felt proud that he came up with it on his own. He turned back to Amelia and noticed her blink several times. He snidely remarked "Your go," before "I'll go get us something to eat."

"Okay but you might not be able to reach the good stuff" he heard her say. He scoffed at that remark. She might be taller than him, but she wasn't that much taller. And besides her parents would need to have access to this stuff.

He quickly found some snacks and headed back. He paused to look at the time and noticed that he still had roughly an hour left. He would need to stall a bit longer if he wanted to keep her out of trouble. Perhaps it was time for a different game anyway. He was getting a bit bored of Scrabble and thought it might be best to quit while he was ahead.

Getting back to where Amelia was, he saw her playing with the lights, something she was able to do with her new height. Upon seeing him she gave a small "Yay", and remarked that it was his go. He felt something was different about her but couldn't tell what. He noticed that her shirt seemed different from before. Perhaps a bit stretched? No it seemed like a different color, no a completely different shirt. But why would that be? He put the snacks down and Amelia quickly started eating them. As Chad sat down, he looked for what new word she made and only one stood out. BOSOM. He looked at it then back at Amelia. Surely not he thought. Then he remembered her hair and how he was sure it wasn't that beautiful before. Maybe I should test this, he thought. But then if I'm right, this could be bad. But it couldn't be right, could it? That would mean... No he didn't want think what it would mean. He was probably being silly. Still it might be best just to be sure...

14212121121222212.content:
Chad's eyes flicked between Amelia and the game board a few more times, his expression cloudy as he considered the implications of his wayward thoughts; if he was right, than any word that he or his 'little' cousin played... they would... that was insane though. How could something like that even be possible!?Images of Wesley, the small, vindictive wizard passed through Chad's mind and the teenager finally regained some semblance of control over himself, allowing a long-held breath to hiss out from between his lips. He couldn't let this continue. He was supposed to be the responsible adult here, her babysitter; crazy as the possibility was, if there was even an outward chance of him being correct he had an obligation to protect the girl from the wicked ways of the game. Chad raised his head to gaze at Amelia once more, the faint curves beneath his cousin's new shirt more than enough to strengthen his resolve.

"Look, Amelia." The youth began, "What would you say about maybe playing another board game together? I'm getting kind of bored of this one." His cousin glanced down at him while one of her fingers lazily twirled a few stray locks of her luxurious hair around it, her stare lasting for a long time before a smug smile finally crept onto the girl's lips. "Oh, I seeeee Chad. That's fine, so long as you're willing to admit the real reason that you don't want to keep playing Scrabble with me."

"Uh, the... real reason...?" Chad rejoined hesitantly. There was no way she could know about his concerns, since they were pretty outlandish even for him.

"Oh nothing," she replied in a sing-song voice. "Just that you're worried about getting your butt kicked in Scrabble by a girl less than half your age." His cousin's grin seemed to grow even wider as she put her cards on the table, her expression practically brimming with perceived superiority.

"Amelia, that's not wh-"

"I know that it must be really embarrassing for a grown-up like you to admit, but it's alright, I promise I won't laugh." She said as she stifled her giggles, the girl's tongue faintly peeking out from between the center of her lips.

Chad started to unconsciously grind his teeth together, getting more than a little bit frustrated with his cousin and her antics at this point. He was trying to protect her for God's sake! "Well, that must be why I still have a 50 point lead," the teenager sarcastically shot back, "I'm practically quaking in my boots over here."

Amelia's smile melted away, replaced by an acutely aggravated pout. "I've been closing that gap these past few rounds and you know it. Give me a few more turns and that lead of yours will be all gone."

"Yeah yeah." Chad waved his hand dismissively in Amelia's general direction, only further irritating the already annoyed young girl.

"Well, it's not as though you have a word to play right now, do you? That's why you're trying to get out of the game." The smug look had returned, his cousin now looking even more sure of herself than before.

"Oh yeah? Well watch this." Chad hastily picked a pair of tiles off of his rack and slid them smoothly into place, the additional '-ER' turning 'SMART' into 'SMARTER' in a matter of moments, the move earning the teenager a more than respectable amount of points. "What do you say to that?"

Amelia's expression went blank for a scant few seconds as she blinked a couple of times, her eyes drifting down to the board below and seeming to regard it with new understanding. "I think," she began, her tone oddly subdued compared to her previous utterances, "that it's my turn now."

It took scarcely half a minute before the young girl announced that she was ready, one of Chad's eyebrows raising as he watched her long fingers carefully pluck six of her tiles from the safety of her rack. A little grin found its way to the teenager's lips as she started to put down what she had, the teenager confident there was no way she'd manage to craft a word of that length on her own. All of that bluster rushed right out of him when he came face to face with her word: 'NATURAL', going straight through the 'T' in 'SMARTER' and capturing both a Triple Letter and a Double Word space. "Your go," Amelia declared, the mocking edge in her tone now far subtler than it had ever been before. "Just remember that I'm here if you need any assistance."

Normally, and especially after his earlier revelations, Chad might have found the sudden shift in Amelia's vocabulary to be somewhat strange, but the teenager was far too incensed for these worrying thoughts to reach him now. His little cousin had completely embarrassed him and there was no way that he was going to let that stand. He was playing to win now, and so he racked his brain until he found the best word that he could, four of his tiles in hand as he placed 'SAVVY' off of the 'S' in 'STAMINA'. One of the V's had even been on a Double Letter score, netting him even more points in the process. "I think I'm doing just fine, thank you."

Amelia blinked yet again and giggled a bit to herself, one of her hands rising to cover her lips. "Well yes, you are doing fine, but you're going to need to do better than that to stay ahead of me." Chad practically growled in response as the girl turned her attention back to her tiles, remarkably little time passing before she pulled four of the squares from their places. She shot him a wry grin as she juggled the tiles around in her hand, the sheer arrogance of the gesture getting to Chad quicker than he'd like to admit.

"That's a pretty short word to be getting so excited about, Amelia."

His cousin's smile didn't even falter once, the girl practically snickering at him now. "It might be short, Chad, but it's going to be oh so very sweet." Before he could begin to think of a response to that particular line, Amelia put down her pieces: she made use of the 'B' in 'BOSOM' and the 'M' in 'STAMINA' in order to put down 'BUXOM', the 'X' right on top of another Triple Word space. The blush that swiftly spread across Chad's face had Amelia roaring with laughter, her body practically quivering with the exertion. The teenager raised his head to protest, but the words died before they passed through his lips, his eyes rooted to his cousin's body. The earlier additions to Amelia's chest were subtly bouncing up-and-down, but more than that they seemed to be getting... bigger. Chad blinked, then blinked again, as though to confirm that what he was seeing was real; before long he caught sight of her nipples starting to poke through her top, the girl's breasts clearly more prominent than they'd been previously The teenager now found himself unable to look away from the almost surreal spectacle unfolding before his very eyes, the changes as fascinating as they were bizarre. The larger the swells grew, the less room they had inside the girl's shirt, the garment stretching and contorting until finally... it was replaced by an entirely different shirt, this one more adequately sized to hold her growing endowments. Their bouncing was far from subtle at this point, every movement Amelia made sending another rumble through her now formidable chest and deepening Chad's blush another noticeable shade.

The growth continued for quite some time, the second shirt eventually giving up the ghost as well and transitioning into a third top. Only when this blouse reached near capacity as well did the changes finally cease, his cousin now the proud owner of what looked to be a pair of hefty E-Cup breasts, possibly even F's. Still, for all of their mass the twin orbs had remained surprisingly perky, no evidence of a bra beneath the shirt to hold the two in place.

"Earth to Chad. The game is down there, not up here." Chad sputtered and glanced up at his cousin, her words breaking the spell that had so entranced him. Her face was impossibly young for the body she now possessed, the girl flashing a knowing smile in his direction. "I know that I developed super early, Chad, but you have to remember my real age, alright? Anyway, it's your turn, so good luck holding on to that lead of yours - you'll need it."

"You just wait," Yuki says happily. "One of these days, I'll be bigger than you!" Chad watches the Asian girl have another growth spurt, making it to 4'7". "I'm already bigger than everyone else in class."

She swelled again, not stopping until she was close to 5 feet tall. Chad expected Amelia to grow more, too, but surprisingly, she remained the same height as before, something for which he was very grateful.

Yuki's clothes had begun to rip further, her sleeves exposing her arms a little, her pants beginning to tear along the sides. "I'm already bigger than my parents!" The girl's shoes began to come apart as she made it to 5'3" before stopping. Standing so close to Yuki, Chad realized he was causing her to grow quicker and he tried to get away from her, but in the next second, the Asian girl grabbed his hand and half dragged him over to the other side of the room. She started going through Amelia's toy chest, looking for something to play with, enjoying a steady stream of growth throughout, although she was completely unaware of it. Soon, she was almost the same height as Chad, her clothes in tatters on the floor next to her, being replaced with a pink swimsuit similar to Amelia's.

The pair stood up, the teen staring over at the giant Asian as she held a couple of dolls in her hands. "I'll probably be bigger than you by this time next week," she told him, giggling as she swelled to 6'3". Still laughing, Yuki put down her toys and grabbed Chad's hands, wanting to compare their sizes. Pressing their palms together, she remarked, "Wow look at how much bigger my hands are than yours!" Another growth spurt hit her, more powerful than before and Chad watched with increased dread as the 6 year old towered over him, more than a head taller before it was over. She grinned down at him, pulling the teenager over to Amelia's stuffed animals, noticing a pink elephant on her shelf.

"Hey, when did you get this?" Yuki asked her friend, still growing at a good pace.

"Oh, a few weeks ago, I think," the 10 foot girl replied, playing with her giraffe on her bed. "My dad got it for me."

The steadily swelling Asian sat down next to Amelia, Chad standing between them, helpless as Yuki grew more and more. As the two friends reached the same size, the anxious teen watched the room itself grow larger, the walls stretching taller, the door frame reaching higher to allow both girls to leave without difficulty. Everything around Chad was slowly dwarfing him. He walked into the hallway, realizing the same phenomenon was happening elsewhere.

"Of course Amelia's parents would expand their house," Chad thought to himself, as reality changed around him. "If they had a giant daughter, she would need space to run around and play." Returning to the girls, they were both sitting up straight now, their heads a long ways away from the ceiling as they played comfortably.

"Oof, you're heavy, Aiden! And you keep growing! You just keep getting bigger and bigger..." His mother Jessica remarked as she carried the two foot nine inch toddler. Unbeknownst to her, Aiden slowly began to expand, his clothes tightening around his growing form. He gradually passed three foot, and slowly stopped growing, leaving him at 3'2".

"You're a VERY big boy, Aiden!" Jessica said before blowing a raspberry on his belly, which was left exposed by his comparatively smaller clothes. "Very, very big! Bigger than all the other kids at nursery..." Once again, she failed to notice the toddler begin to swell due to the effects of the curse. "You're not just big, you're HUGE!" She teased the 3'5" toddler, making him spurt up and up to 3'9", making him as tall as most 8 year old boys.

Jessica loved to tease her baby about his height while she played with him. She blew a long raspberry on his big belly, and said, "Really, really big! Huge! Ginormous! Gigantic!" Prompting a loud laugh from Aiden, who was now naked, having long outgrown his clothes. Aiden began to slowly spurt larger and larger, reaching 4 foot in several seconds, then 4'5", then 5' even!

14212122.content:
Choose between these two friends of Jenny's; Laura Jones and Emily Harrow.

Laura was a shy girl who usually kept to herself. She was typically the class loner and only hung out with Jenny at times. Very introverted, she didn't like attention being drawn to her and usually tried to hide in the shadows. She will wear a jersey and baggy clothes where she can and never wears make up, almost as though she is afraid of being attractive (which she might be). She was very thin and not very good at sports, having asthma. This had excluded her from most physical activities growing up as well as P.E. This caused her to stay inside and get lost in books and games, where she could be whoever she wanted to be. She has no idea why Jenny likes to hang out with her but she is glad that she does, though they usually talk online in private rather than at school as Laura doesn't want to be a burden to Jenny. Still she has been round to Jenny and Chad's house a few times, mostly to help Jenny study. She has a bit of a crush on Chad, but then so do most girls in school. He is one of the few boys that she has actually mustered up enough courage to talk to, albeit just to reply to some of his questions.

Emily on the other hand is an extreme extrovert. She was friends with almost everyone in her year and was one of the most popular girls in school. An extreme extrovert, she feels like she always needs to be doing something and hates lulls in the conversation as she fears that the other person will leave. This might stem from abandonment issues and having both of her parents walk out on her and so she now lives with her grandmother. She is a cheerleader and one of the most attractive girls in school as well as one of the most athletic. She fears becoming fat and unpopular and hence abandoned and so works out constantly to keep her figure. It also gives her an excuse to be around all the hot guys working out, which she likes. She can be cunning at times, using others to get what she wants. One such person is Jenny. While she does enjoy being around Jenny, she likes Chad and, ever since learning about Jenny being Chad's younger sister, has felt that it is her chance to get to know Chad and get him to notice her. Having an appreciation of physical strength, she desires to be like him but also wants him. As such, she is constantly going round to Jenny's place for things, especially when she knows that Chad will be round.

So who will it be?

Cindy took her school yearbook and flipped through the pages in the back of her book. Then, she found the section which listed all the students who were in the same class as she was. To her delight, she spotted a few really good friends of hers. In addition, she found the photo of Chad. Then, almost on the same page, she discovered the photos and names of several other guys who were players on the football team as well.

She wanted to show Chad that she could get a date with any of the other cool guys at school. In fact, she wanted to show him that just because Chad thought that he was one of the hot-shot football players didn't mean that she couldn't get a date with any of the OTHER football players who were also on the team. But, who could she call?

Then, she remembered one of the guys who was always kind of shy and in the background. She looked up the team picture and looked at all the guys who were pictured in the far back row in the photo. These were always the guys who were shy and a little more distant. They were the ones who shunned the spotlight and who didn't care much for being in the news all the time.

She examined the picture closely and was able to pick out some of the guys who were standing on the back row. One of them was Ed Greenway, the Tight End on the football team. Ed was tall and muscular, and he had short black hair with blue eyes. He was a nice guy but he was quiet and always a bit in the background. Nobody had ever mentioned anything about him having a girl friend before, and he was always seen being alone and walking around the school by himself or with other football players but never with a girl.

So, Cindy called around her girl friends and started asking around for Ed's phone number. She got a hold of other girls who were dating the other members of the football team, and one guy had to ask the other in order to get more information about Ed. Finally, one of the other players was able to relay a phone number to Cindy via another player who just happened to have Ed's number in his cell phone.

Cindy quickly hung up and entered the number in her address book. Then, she took a deep sigh and though for a minute about what she was going to say. Surely, everybody knew who Chad was, and she was already known as Chad's girlfriend. So, she would have to explain to Ed that she was single as of now and that she was no longer dating Chad. Hoping that Ed would understand, she figured that the quickest way to a man's heart would be through his stomach so she thought about inviting him to dinner or to a picnic or to a trip to the Chinese buffet down the street before going to the movie theater which was only a block away from the school.

She dialed the number and to her surprise, Ed Greenway answered the phone almost right away!

"Yo!"

"Hi there Ed..." she said calmly.

"Uhmm... Who's this?" he wondered.

"It's Cindy."

"Cindy?"

"From school. I'm in your History class?"

"Ohh yeah THAT Cindy! What's going on, doll?" he asked her. "Are you still going out with Chad?"

"No, sweetie! Not anymore..." she replied calmly.

"What?"

"What are you doing this week? Are you busy?"

"Well... I got practice today and tomorrow, and then the game on Friday! But after that... I'll be free!" he responded.

"How about... we get together and do something fun on Saturday afternoon?" Cindy grinned.

"Sure, babe! What do you suggest?"

"How about we just get together in the park and have us a little picnic together?" she offered. "I'll provide sandwiches if you bring the drinks and some dessert!"

"You got yourself a deal, sweetheart!"

So they set up a date and time to meet and they picked the park and location. This was going to be a great little picnic in the park.

Cindy hung up the phone and showed and evil grin. She could only begin to imagine the look on Chad's face when he found out that she now had a date with one of his teammates...

We do not have to rush anything though.'

145121.content:
Julie was in the family's home gym, trying to keep fit. Her son Chad was always making comments about how she and her husband were out of shape and it was beginning to get to her. After all, wasn't she the one who taught how to play basketball when he was little? Just once, she wished she could beat him in a game of one-one like she used to and teach him some humility.

Julie took out these frustrations on the new punching bag. With each blow, her arms became buffer and the bag went farther. She didn't notice however until the bag went flying into the wall. She was shocked to find that she now looked as young as she was when Chad was born, with the body of a lightweight female bodybuilder. She felt incredible!

Her first instinct was to continue her workout,but she also wanted to challenge Chad to a game of one-on-one. She felt like she could take him again. What does she do?
145121.title: Muscle Mom

Julie felt that she needed more power and resistance to pain. She continued to work out on a new punching bag that was bigger. She held back a little bit but worked on her speed. She was amazed that she was punching the bag over a hundred times a minute. She flexed again and looked in the mirror. Juile now looked like a medium weight male bodybuilder and the skills of the current skills of a champion professional male boxer.

Julie fixed her hair into a ponytail and did her makeup like a barbie doll.
She smiled a mom-like smile and walked into the den where Chad was watching a MMA match on TV.
She smiled and said 'Chad,my dear son, would you look at me for a minute. The commercial is on now.'

Chad turned back at his mom in amazement and said 'M-m-mom, is that you?'

She nodded " I know that you need a challenger for a one on one basketball game. Or you can try something else like arm wrestling. Don't be afraid to take on your buff mom. Do you want to try a basketball game with me or arm wrestling.'

14521.content:
At school, Chad was in his science class, run by Mr Jorko, the science teacher.

Mr Jorko was a man in his late 30s with frizzy brown hair, and he wore a lab coat, over a blue shirt, brown pants and black sneakers.

Chad just couldn't help thinking about the wizard he'd met the day before.

All too soon, the end period bell rang loudly.

Suddenly, Mr Jorko's stomach made a strange gurgle. "I need to go to the toilet." he said. "See yourselves out, my students." He got up, and ran to the toilet.

When he got into the toilet, he looked at himself in the mirror. His clothes looked sorta odd on him, because he could see his bellybutton that his shirt was no longer covering.

who should we follow now?
14521.title: Height

145211.content:
As Chad walked to his next class, he couldn't help thinking about what had happened to his science teacher

then, he gasped. He thought back to the day the wizard cursed him. “Bigger!” he heard the wizard say in his mind.

What Chad didn't know was that the wizard's curse wasn't aimed directly at him, it was affecting someone around him. And by 'around him', the wizard meant any of the teachers and/or staff in the school.

"No." Chad said to himself. "It must be a figment of my imagination. That wizard just cursed me, and only me."
145211.title: Chad

145212.content:
Mr Jorko just stared at his reflection in dumb shock. He didn't know that his best student had just angered a wizard that cursed him to see a member of staff at his school get bigger. And that member was him, Chad's acience teacher.

He felt his shirt slowly ride up his chest, his jeans were tightening under the strain of his growing legs, and he noticed his shoes were feeling the strain of his expanding feet.

Meanwhile, outside the school, Wesley was watching from a tree in his invisible state. "This is so much fun!" he said.
145212.title: Mr Jorko

1452122.content:
MEANWHILE...

Chad was walking down the hallway to his next class when he saw the corridor was blocked by a group of students. He was surprised.

"Our science teacher, Mr Jorko, has been in there since this morning!" said one student.
"We need to use the bathroom!" another student said.

"Don't panic." Chad said calmly. "I'll go in and check on him."

Chad calmly went up to the door. "uhh, Mr Jorko? Are you in there?" he asked.

No answer.

Chad opened the door.... and shut it quickly.

"Well?" asked another student. "Is he there?"

Chad nodded nervously. "Well, you could say that." He said. He opened the door again. "Take a look."

THE students looked and gasped in horror. They saw Mr Jorko was now...
1452122.title: Meanwhile with Chad...

14521221.content:
...50 feet tall!

"Oh no..." Chad whispered. He and the other students could see their science teacher's gigantic foot.

they looked inside to see Mr Jorko crouching in the restroom. he was about 50ft tall, and all his clothes had torn off, so he was naked. If he stood up, he could destroy the room, and presumably, the school.
14521221.title: ...50 feet tall!

145212211.content:
the students all stared with their mouths agape, with Ashley A from Recess making a cameo in the crowd.

there was a long silence.

then.

"Mr Jorko?!" Chad said, shocked beyond repair. "What on Earth happened to you?!?!?!"

"I don't know, Chad!!" Mr Jorko said. Chad and the students winced and covered their ears. Now that their teacher was 50 feet tall, his voice could be heard all the way from the Moon!

'Oh boy!' Chad thought. 'I do hope things don't get any worse!'

But Chad was wrong. Becuase at that moment, Mr Jorko felt a surge in his body that made him grow 10 feet taller. Now Chad's science teacher was 60 feet tall!

Now what?!?!

Arthur felt his shirt slowly ride up his chest, his jeans were tightening under the strain of his growing legs, and he noticed his socks were tearing off his expanding feet.

Meanwhile, outside Artie's house, Wesley was watching from a tree in his invisible state. "This is so much fun!" he said.

Arthur began to sweat as he slowly walked out of the bathroom, ducking his head to avoid hitting the door frame. He went into his bedroom, and sat on the bed in dumb shock, with his shirt and pants now very tight on him, almost to tearing point, and his tattered socks now mere ankle bands.

14531111.content:
Chad had been waiting hours on end for his uncle. He decided to have a look and see what the matter was. He got up, headed upstairs, and went into the bathroom, because that's where Arthur had to go to go to the toilet.

When he got in there, he saw only torn bits from his uncle's socks. Chad gasped. He thought back to the day the wizard cursed him. “Bigger!” he heard the wizard say in his mind.

What Chad didn't know was that the wizard's curse wasn't aimed directly at him, it was affecting someone around him. And by 'around him', the wizard meant a member of his family, and that member was his uncle Arthur.

The answer struck him like a bullet: his uncle Arthur was growing!

Chad headed to his uncle's bedroom, opened the door, and saw to his shock that his uncle was now...
14531111.title: Chad decides to check on his uncle.

'Oh boy!' Chad thought. 'I do hope things don't get any worse!'

Now what?!?!
1453111111.title: Artie grows 10 feet more!

choices: Arthur and Chad decide to walk into the city.
14531111111.content:
Chad stared at his 40 foot tall Uncle Arthur. This was not how his visit was turning out at all!

He only hoped Artie wouldn't grow any bigger, because if he did, who knows what would happen?!

"I'm gettin' rather crammed in here, Chadster!" Arthur said. Chad winced and covered his ears. Now that his uncle was 40 feet tall, his voice could be heard all the way from the planet Jupiter, never mind the Moon!

"Maybe you should try to get out!" Chad suggested.

"Good Idea!" Artie said. He forced all his strength against the roof. It slowly began to creak, then groan, then it cracked! Artie managed to lift the roof right off! He carefully stepped right out of his bedroom, and quickly put the roof back on.

Chad ran outside to see a 40 foot tall Uncle Arthur standing outside his house, 40 feet tall, and in all his naked glory, with a pleased expression on his face. "I just knew you could do it, Uncle Artie!" Chad said.

Artie laughed, which sounded almost like thunder. "Me too, Chadster." Artie said. He was glad he'd got out of his predicament, but he was strangely puzzled at what happened to him. Even though Arthur wished that he was tall, he never wished to be that tall.

Meanwhile, outside Artie's house, Wesley was watching from a tree in his invisible state. "This is so much fun!!" he said, cackling just like a maniac. He liked this game. it was so much fun!!! After all, Uncle Arthur was not the one who insulted him but Chad.

"I'll take that as a 'yes'." Artie said.

he put his huge hand on the ground. Chad cautiously climbed on it, then Arthur lifted him up. Chad felt a wave of vertigo as he rose faster than an elevator in the air to what seemed to him to be thirty feet (nine meters) straight up.

Joe, and Justin, his workmate, each positioned themselves on one side of a crate. They grabbed it as good as they could and promised to lift it on three. “One…two…three!”

Justin, even though the crate was heavy, managed to lift up his side some inches. However the strangest thing happened on Joe’s side.

Joe, remembering the crate was extremely heavy, got ready to give it all the strength he got. When he yelled the number three, he pulled and to both his as well as Justin's surprise, he lifted it up almost a foot. It seemed much lighter than he remembered. The crate, now hanging in the air somewhat slanted, almost pushed over Justin who let it drop to the ground out of shock.

The men tried again, this time Joe applied less force, and they managed to put the crate into the storage house. As they were walking with the heavy crate in their hands, Justin couldn’t help but stare at his fellow worker. His shirt looked somewhat different on him, as if his body underneath was somehow bigger. Maybe Joe was secretly working out to become bigger.

At fourteen, Justin was a couple of years younger than Chad, but their paths seemed to cross more often than Chad would like. Justin was your typical skater type, shaggy brown hair, skinny build, about a foot shorter than Chad, and always wearing his green beanie, wristbands, long-sleeved shirts with crazy designs on them, baggy shorts, and long, brightly colored striped socks. That wasn't what annoyed Chad, though. Justin always seemed to be there whenever Chad stepped outside, almost as if he was waiting for him. Sure, he was often with his skater friends there, and he didn't ever really say much of anything other than a quick "Hi," but Chad still felt like he was stalking him, and would usually shun or avoid him.

Today, however, as he walked by the house, he felt an odd urge to turn and look Justin's direction. He wasn't sure why; he felt like something was almost forcing his neck to twist towards Justin. He was hanging out with a few of his skater friends that he usually hung out with, both of whom lived in the neighborhood but neither of whom Chad knew the names of. Justin was on his board, looking like he was trying to perform some sort of kickflip trick and not being very successful, but still laughing and having a good time.

Chad tried to fight the urge to look at Justin and head into his house, but he felt compelled to keep staring. As he did so, he heard the voice of the man from the grocery store speak, as clearly as if he were standing in front of him, though he didn't see anyone else around.

"Bigger."

As soon as the word was said, Justin began to grow, and grow a lot. Within a few seconds, he was already a head taller than his friends, looking at both them and down at his own body with a stunned expression. "Whoa! W-what's happening?"
