Danny pulled the mail from the mailbox, all the while watching as Chad and his friends played basketball on the court near his house. He'd lost track of the many times he was pushed, shoved, or generally booted from the court.

"If only I were stronger," he muttered, "Then maybe I would have that court more often."

He asked his mom if he could try lifting weights, but she refused, saying that he was too young and would hurt himself. No matter what he did to compromise, he wasn't allowed to lift weights.

Setting the mail on the counter, he went to his room, keeping his shoes on in case Chad and his friends left the court. Looking at himself in his closet mirror, his 11 year old face had strong features, perfectly white and straight teeth, and deep blue eyes with black hair. He would have been dating had it not been for his belly. He did have some blubber on him, just enough to make a belly.

He jumped onto his bed on pulled out his phone. He was fooling around on his phone, when he felt a tingling feeling went through his body. He shook it off, and continued to play Temple Run. What he failed to notice was that his feet were growing! His socks began to stretch tight around his growing feet, finally tearing off as his feet grew to a size 10 in Mens, his ankles thickening to match. When he heard his socks tear off, he saw his now massive feet as thick veins clarified around them, and felt the lower part of his jeans feel snug around his growing calves.

He jumped off his bed and ran to the wall mirror and watched his calves gain a massive amount of thick, dense muscle, growing into massive footballs of power, and gaining an impressive diamond cut shape. The cuff of his jeans pulled up around his ankles and shins, and tears began to appear at the seams, before tearing off at the knee as they reached their final size and thick veins clarified on the surface.

His biceps grew massive, becoming extremely peaked, and becoming so ripped that they become split peaks, tearing his sleeves off.

His triceps became thick and ripped as well, gaining an impressive horseshoe shape when flexed, as well as showing all three heads of the muscle. Chad sighed. "Hey!" he shouted. "I'm down here!" he yelled at the top of his voice. But it didn't work. he was too tiny to be heard. He quickly grabbed onto Mr Victor's pant leg. Mr Victor walked off to his office.

Chad thought back to the day the wizard cursed him. “Bigger!” he heard the wizard say in his mind.

However, what Chad didn't know was that the wizard's curse wasn't just aimed directly at him, it was affecting someone around him.

And because he was clinging on to his headteacher's pant leg, the curse was slowly gonna affect his headteacher too!

What now?
1521211121221.title: Chad tries to get his attention

choices: Mr Victor shrinks down to Chad's size
15212111212211.content:
As Mr Victor walked to his lab, he hardly felt himself shrink about a few inches in height, nor did he notice that his clothes were suddenly lookin' more baggy... yet.

Chad clung on as tightly as he could to his headteacher's baggy-looking pants leg, unaware that his headteacher had suddenly begun shrinking.

Whilst Mr Victor, unaware of the fact he was slowly shrinking, slowly walked all the way to the door to his office and entered it.

Chad gulped as he got off his headteacher's pants leg, ran into the office, and quickly darted into a nearby cupboard to hide. He felt cold, so he decided to make something to wear.

That didn’t prove a simple task for the foot-high jock. His best efforts at scavenging among assorted debris in the cupboard yielded some old fabric, which he fashioned a makeshift loincloth from. He looked ridiculous, but at least it was better than au natural.

Also by this time, Mr Victor suddenly noticed that his clothes had suddenly became bigger. "I think I'm gonna have to call the dry cleaners!" he complained under his breath.

However, Mr Victor didn't know that Chad, one of his students, had just angered a wizard that cursed him to have some bullies in the school grow, or shrink him down to one foot tall, or spread the curse like germs to him.

Suddenly, Chad's headteacher's thoughts were rudely interrupted when he stumbled and fell onto the floor of his office. He saw that he'd tripped over the legs of his baggy pants. He sighed, then he pushed himself up, shedding his pants, shoes and socks in the process. He heaved himself onto his chair and wriggled his shrinking toes.

Mr Victor was now half his size. And he was VERY confused about what had happened to him.
15212111212211.title: Shrinking HeadTeacher

152121112122111.content:
Mr Victor got out of his chair, and walked over to the cupboard, as Chad, now in his fabric loincloth, was slowly getting out. Chad gasped. He darted under the cupboard, to avoid his headteacher's huge, albeit shrinking, bare feet.

Chad was worried. He was trapped, his head teacher was shrinking, and the wizard he'd angered was to blame!

Just then, Mr Victor sunk into his huge clothes, then disappeared into them. The clothes themselves formed a wind as they fell to the ground, and Chad hung back even as he saw the lump that was now his own size fighting its way to out of the tent-like fabric. Soon, he saw Mr Victor's black-haired head poke out of the top of his shirt, and gaze around in horrified wonder.

Upon realizing that he was naked, he covered his penis with his hands and stepped out of the suit top gingerly. Of course, his underwear didn't shrink with him. "What--what happened to me?"

Mr Victor had shrank down to Chad's current size!
152121112122111.title: Mr Victor shrinks down to Chad's size

Mr Victor sat down on his shoe in dumb shock. He was now no higher than a mouse, and his clothes were now far too large to wear.

Chad, who was hiding under the cupboard, was worried too. He'd be dead meat if his headteacher saw him, and he was in a whole lot of a problem, if not more.

Mr Victor stared around his giant office, and wriggled his toes. 'Maybe,' he thought, 'being shrunk isn't so bad. I could easily explore the small parts of this school, and live in my cupboard. and-'

His thoughts were rudely interrupted when someone came into the office. who was it.

info.brief_description: A high school jock experiences amazing growth in his life after he angers a wizard!
info.description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE ADDING: Do not post SHORT chapters (less than 50 words) and please do not post multiple chapters with the same narrative and/or the same chapter title. The first time, I will email you nicely to heed this warning. The second time, I will DELETE ALL YOUR CHAPTER(S) WITHOUT WARNING.

*****

Chad Cole had just come home from Bunky’s Gym, which was just two blocks from his house. That was only three blocks from Kennedy High School, where he was a sophomore. Chad was 16 years old; he was already six feet tall and 190 pounds of lean muscle. He had the body of a swimmer, the looks of a model or an actor, and all the girls in school were already chasing after him.

Chad was a member of the basketball team where he played as a guard and he was among the best shooters on the team! He was the type of guy who just didn't miss any of his shots during a big game! He could run, he could pass, he could shoot and he didn’t choke when he had to stand at the free-throw line.

So, it was only natural that Chad was in a great mood, when he was walking into the Publix Supermarket down the street from his house. Mom left a note on the fridge stating that they had run out of cat food, and she asked if Chad could pick up a bag since she had to go get his little brother Daniel from soccer practice. Daniel was 12 years old and he was always “Chad’s Little Bro”.

Of course, Chad had no idea what would happen when he ran into the strange man, who had just walked out of the grocery store that day…

+++++++++++++++++++++

I created this story following the disappearance of one of my favorite interactive stories, "Curse of Growth". I had added a LOT of chapters to that story and now that story, along with my chapters, has disappeared. Well, This is my attempt to bring it back. So, I hope people will read it and add to it! Enjoy!

Scriptboy
rextorres

A special shout-out to the following writers who have contributed TONS of AWESOME chapters to this story. Without their valuable contributions, this story would just be boring!!

skatoony
oracolus
Moe (49)
skywalker7
infinity421 (36)

THANK YOU!!!!!!!
